name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: My vegetables and fruit turned Black next day after UV treatments. I am not sure is it 4 tubes give access exposure .Now I am worried if it is good idea to use it for vegetables sanitization....

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Box seems good and alarm is set after 15 minutes and not 6 minutes as written in the discription . there is no indicator.How do we know that all four uv lights are working properly? In case any light is not working, how will we get to know?

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Thank you for changing the timer

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Does its job. It has 4 lamps and mirrors on all sides unlike most competitors that have 2 lamps. Only grouse is the 15 minute timer is useless. I don't need to expose any object for 15 minutes. I open the box after 5 or 6 minutes. Should be enough when competitors whose boxes have only 2 lamps recommend 4 minutes to disinfect.Edit: The company replaced the timer from the previous 15 mins to 6 minutes on their own.

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Best Product in these price segment.

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: The product specifications do not match the details on Amazon. NO BUZZER SOUND. No indicator lights either. You just have to wait like a fool to estimate the disinfection cycle which is claimed to last for 6 minutes. If you want it to be 20 minutes you either can have 18 minutes or 24 minutes and that too without any indications. Hope it has the genuine UV lights and the claim is not false on that count as well!GODREJ COULD NOT BE WORST THAN THIS!

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: The product is useless, There is no indicator for power on,There is proper response either from Amazon and manufacturers.The customer care axecutive is not at all helpful. Want to return but customer care executive is not helpful.

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: 4 lights are very useful for effective sanitization but they produce a bit more heat which is a kind of side effect. Depends on what you put inside the box .

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Overall Price is WORTH IT!Fits Laptop upto 14.1”, Helmet smaller size only, fruits and vegetable all can be put without issues. Looks pretty decent for your home!But;1. Smells horrible after every cycle (room gets polluted)2. One rack means effectively you can place 10-12 soaps.3. If you over stack them no disinfection possible. Take caution and do less and more cycles to ensure4. One switch operation (plug & play). Timer is to be followed manually or wait for beep (no display if you are curious to know what time has lapsed)5. Wire is three pin, so the earthing is critical, I felt some mild shocks.

name: Godrej-ViroShield-Disinfecting-VIROSHIELD-30UV
review: Useless product of two accounts:1. There is no timer. There is a flat cycle of 6 minutes before the buzzer rings2. The moment you open the door while the device is working, you can see the UV lamps for a fraction of a second which is a health hazard.This is a classic product where the practicality and safety have been ignored to cash into the fear pshycosis of the customers.

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-1805NM01
review: Utterly disappointed to get a defected product from the manufacturer (the Seller was the Company itself). Packing was good however the peel over the dial was not in its place and there was a spot just above the 10. That was unexpected in a Brand now product. Hence, I requested for a replacement. There was no such policy so I had to return it.

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-1805NM01

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Blue-Watch-1774SM01
review: The watch looks superb. Excellent finish. You get exactly what you see in the photos. Product rating is 5 star.BUT i dont think the seller , Cloudtail , handled the product properly. When i opened the box, to my disappointment i found the thin plastic that covers a new watch glass face is all crumpled up to a corner. I was scared thinking the glass face must be damaged, but thank God it wasnt the case. Also there's no dealer stamp in the warranty card.My take: if you really like what you see, go for it. And if you are scared to buy online then buy it from the brick mortar shops, cause its worth it.

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Blue-Watch-1774SM01

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Blue-Watch-1774SM01
review: I bought the watch for my father.Thank you Amazon for delivering it before the delivery date!The packaging, however; was bad. The box is made up of cardboard and the watch was already outside the box when delivered. Thankfully, it wasn't damaged.When I received the watch, it wasn't working, so I had to change the cell myself.The watch looks good and straps are sturdy enough.So if I had to rate,Delivery 4 starsThe product 4 starsPackaging 1 star

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Black-Watch-NK1639SM02
review: Got it to gift a groom at his wedding. Beautiful timepiece. In fact I loved it do much I'm getting one for myself. The black dial and the silver hands and silver marking makes the functioning of the watch look stunning and royal. Dial size is just right. It is definitely not small and it is not very big either. It looks very well balanced on the wrist. And the metal bracelet that comes with it is beautiful and goes perfectly with the timepiece dimension wise and there's no mismatch between them. Go for it without any second guessing. You'll love it ❤️ Thank you Amazon and thank you Titan. Both amazing companies and now you both have a very very happy and loyal customer in me for life.

name: Titan-Karishma-Analog-Black-Watch-NK1639SM02
review: Got it delivered yesterday. My wrist is very small and most of the watches look odd on my wrist. For this reason I don't like to use watches. Recently I decided to get a watch myself and after thorough browsing I chose to buy this one. The dial is small and doesn't look odd on small wrists. But the chain strap should have been more elegant and thee locking system shld have been easy. All in all this watch didn't disappoint me.

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-NK1730SL02
review: Very nice and classic looking watch with added benefit of date window & radium for night use. Good built quality of watch and leather straps are also made of good materials. Got delivered in 2 days only. Superb watch at reasonable pricing...!!!! Thank you Amazon.

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-NK1730SL02
review: This is my personal feedback as per my preference.I bought this watch along with the CHAPS watch.I found the overall look & functionality of CHAPS better than this one.The dial does not look much attractive to me as it looks & feels bulky but not big, also there is a big bezel which steals away the look.Although the overall quality is superb, no doubt about it as its a watch by Titan.So decide for urself as I have attached couple of pictures to justify my feedback.

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-NK1730SL02
review: One of the best Budget analog watch with belt in this 2500rs Segment.This watch is an impressive one.Excellent look.Good build quality.Good Strap design and color.Perfect Fit.Big black dial with radium light glow function.Overall it's a trusted product to buy.Cheers!

name: Titan-Analog-Black-Dial-Watch-NK1730SL02
review: I bought this watch for Rs. 2395. It is awesome and classic watch in this price.1. Looks elegant.2. Classic amd sleek design.3. Added feature of date.4. Urban design.5. Value for money.6. Dial color:Black; Case shape: Round.7. Band color:Brown; Band Material: Leather8. Watch Movement Type: Quartz, Watch Display Type: Analog9. 24 Months Manufacturer Warranty10. Remove plastic at crown to start the watch.11. Recommended for customers looking for a small dial sized watches.It can be wore both wiyh casual and t shirt look.I highly highly recommend this to all those looking for classic design watch under Rs. 3000.All the best for your purchase.😊👍

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: I got a product which is going to be expire in next one month.They are shipping the products which are going to be expire soon.MFG Date: 24/01/18Best Before: 23/07/18I can get the same product out which are manufactured in current month. I am facing the same issue with other products as well.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: Seller: CloudtailPrinted MRP: Rs. 30/- per 250 ml packPurchased for: Rs. 153/- (for 250 ml x 6 packs)Mfg. Date; 01/02/18Exp. Date: 31/07/18Made in: Haryana & Karnataka, INThe alphonso aam variety from the same brand has been unavailable for quite many months now, so I said to myself "What the heck!" and bought this instead. Taste is ok.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: Taste resembles that there is 45% mango pulp in solution. It tastes like a natural mango. If you are not being able to get natural mango shake during season, it may be preferred in off season over other mango juice like Frooti etc.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: Tastes good, one can make out no preservatives or sugar is added. But pls know it is not juice it is mango pulp (aamras). & i feel Paperboat is an Indian company, though not yet researched. All in all a good buy.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: Make sure amazon delivers you a fresh productI had issues with the month of packaging and all but as far as product is concerned, its really good.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: The best Aamras juice pack I have had, compelled me to try out other items by Paper Boat. They were packed with pulp and the original stuff, not like other brands giving in flavored cherry/papaya pulps.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: The paper boat juices are excellent but poor availability on Amazon.Packet received totally damaged.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: It's all perfect except the price per ltr of this aamras if it was around 120Rs/ltr then it would be nice.

name: Paper-Boat-Aamras-Juice-250ml
review: ✔ Fresh juice with Pure Mango.✔ Pack feels little soft to hold.✔ Too much sweetness in drink, tastes like Mango Mood Candy (90's kids remember that)✔ Fresh Stock which has limited six months of expiry.✔ Value for money. Go for it.

review: U may recieve a coke can slightly damaged during transit, but it is 100%original....price is affordable and good deal in good price,specially in this corona.......Beat the Heat with this soft drink......serve chilled .........cool beverage.....

name: Coca-Cola-300ml-Pack-6
review: The can are damaged as per the photo. That came out from the plastic wrapper with coke written on it.Not sure if this has happened due to transit or from manufacturing.However I am not satisfied. I ordered this product as I love the original taste.I might not get my value from the product now.Viraj Mohan

name: Coca-Cola-300ml-Pack-6
review: Firstly i dont understand what does "Warmth" in this review means.Coke is supposed to be consumed cold so warmth is out of my scope of my intelligence.Since lock down, have not been able to get these cans. All grocery stores have pet bottles and as soon as this was listed. Ordered one.

name: Coca-Cola-300ml-Pack-6
review: I received 6 cans of coke, out of which one seemed lighter than normal. It was immediately clear that the can had lesser liquid. I checked for any damage or leakage, but there was none. I have posted photographs of the defective can and a normal one, and the weight displayed is a clear indication.Again, i would like to emphasize that the can was not damaged and the photographs are not edited.

name: Coca-Cola-300ml-Pack-6
review: Overall a good deal. Packing was not good and there were swellings due to pressure buildup, but no complaints. Got it at Rs 199 for 6 cans. Highly recommended.Hope this review is helpful.

name: Natural-Mango-Juice-1L-Pack
review: you should not label a product as "Natural Juice" if it is a mixture of some juice with water and sugar and other flavorings including artificial flavors.  It doesn't taste badly but for anyone who bought it thinking it was going to be a liter of Natural Mango Juice, it is a very disappointing experience.  Why not be honest??

name: Natural-Mango-Juice-1L-Pack
review: I have bought this item a few times from Amazon. This morning however, I ordered it from Amazon Fresh and was shocked to be delivered a carton that was soaked in rat urine and stinking. You can see from the picture how terrible it looked. The juiceboxes inside weren't damaged but the stench of leptospirotic urine is unbearable and other packaged foods were in the same grocery bag!Amazon Fresh items cannot be returned or replaced, unfortunately, so I am stuck with this. Have to discard the juice boxes.

name: Natural-Mango-Juice-1L-Pack
review: Very very bad product.. Didnt expect this quality from B Natural.. I m a regular B Natural customer.. Mainly guava... This time i tried mango... V poor taste... Completely artificial n very diluted drink too.. Thumbs down from me

name: Natural-Mango-Juice-1L-Pack
review: Taste of juice is ok not best . Much sugar added to manufacturing & tags of natural ingredients is only for marketing purpose. No any brand provide natural taste because of it's processing way. As a costumer we understood that avoid it . Take a slice of fruit is better than...

name: Maggi-Masala-Noodles-Singles-840g
review: Maggi is called national food of India, lol. It's tasty and non sticky and can be prepared easily and quickly. So feeling hungry? It's maggi time now.Packaging and delivery was good and prompt. The noodles were recently made so it was a fresh product. Recommend to every age group as a quick snack.

name: Maggi-Masala-Noodles-Singles-840g
review: Review of maggi:Who am I to review Maggi. It's iconic for anyone born in the 80s and 90s.Review of this pack:1) better than large packs that you have to store in the open2) Lasts longer than regular pack of eight, again because its closed.Disadvantage :More plastic usage than regular pack or tenConclusion:If you are going to consume Maggi over longer period of time but this one, if you will finish pack of ten within a week buy the regular large packs as it saves plastic pollution--

name: Maggi-Masala-Noodles-Singles-840g
review: I just love the 2 minute noodle !Pros-1. Broken during delivery or not, doesnt really matter to me, since I prefer to break them into 2 pieces anyways before I cook them2. This family big pack really is cost effective.3. Nestle maggi has been around for so many decades from my childhood and they have been consistent and have even braved the recent questions raised on the quality of their product!4. Masala taste is ever so tasty5. Cooks really fast...ok not 2, let's say 5mins!Cons-1. Though maggi comes with atta noodles (healthier) than this maggi, the atta maggi is quiet expensive than this normal maggi. How I wish the oats and atta maggi would have been cheaper too

name: Amul-Butter-Pasteurised-100g-Pack
review: Seems to be a monopoly. No competitor that’s why charging so much.But yes., adds a reason to have a boaring food with ease

name: Amul-Butter-Pasteurised-100g-Pack
review: You do not need a feedback for an establishment as Amul! They have been pampering all our taste-buds since decades. Lovely product and the only butter brand out there in the market I ever use.

name: Amul-Butter-Pasteurised-100g-Pack
review: I think Amul can never have competition in its dairy products, not at least on its butter.Amul butter has been my favourite since childhood and not a single breakfast or sandwich or cooked/baked dish has gone without Amul butter.A butterlicious product, the very best.Carmelita FernandesFood & Travel Writer

name: Amul-Butter-Pasteurised-100g-Pack
review: Amul's Famous Slogan, and ofcourse my favourite too"Utterly Butterly Delicious AMUL.

name: Amul-Butter-Pasteurised-100g-Pack
review: Amazing product from Amul, the taste has remained same throughout the years and the quality is still awesome.And as always amazing delivery from amazon

name: Amul-Cow-Ghee-500ml
review: A good ghee is granular and thick. This one is more like oil on top and looks granular in the bottom of the bottle. Disappointing as it neither has the flavour or taste of a ‘shush ghee’

name: Amul-Cow-Ghee-500ml
review: Cow ghee is always lighter but not thick. It has not higher cholesterol as buffalo ghee. Coming to the brand wise Amul is the best brand. As all buffalo ghee has more aroma different to cow ghee. It us the words best ghee.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: Even after reporting to Amazon that this product is selling for more than it's MRP of 70/- ... The price here is not updated.The product itself it good.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: Tried this paneer for the first time apprehensively. Surprisingly it's good in terms of texture and quality. Soft enough and decent portion size. Economical given home made Paneer during quarantine is an expensive affair as milk prices are exorbitant.Made some amazing gravy with same. Will definitely order again.Came hygienically packed in a vacuum bag and has a 45day validity. By processed food standards it is excellent not chewy or smelly like most dairy brands but then again it's an Amul product can't go wrong really.Thanks Amazon fresh for the prompt delivery.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: The product mrp shows ₹73 but charged ₹80 by Amazon Fresh. Product quality is good.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: During this indefinite lockdown this paneer has definitely been a saviour.The best part is that the expiry date is almost 45 days. This helps to stock and store paneer and use it as and when need be which actually is not possible with any fresh dairy paneer. It is not very soft like your fresh paneer but still it tastes good enough.I have made tandoori and chinese recipes using this block of paneer and i keep reordering too.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: "Fresh" with just 4-5 more days to expiry received.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: I tried Amul Fresh Paneer Block for the first time since today early morning  I needed it to make Paneer Pizza and amazingly it turned out to be Yummy!! The paneer is quite soft and was delivered  on priority though some might feel it to be expensive  but it really adds fresh flavour and colour to you Delicacies!

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: Amul Paneer is probably the best paneer that you can get in the market. If you get it fresh (which I did) then it has the right consistency, feel and taste. Nothing beats Amul.

name: Amul-Fresh-Paneer-200g
review: Well, Amul product is nice n trustworthy but only point is that this product was delivered to us when it was reaching about its expiry date

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Bitterresssssssstttt of all...Tastes bitter. No sugarhaving a piece of it. I ordered 4. Will finish it in 4 months time.Eat it as a medicine. Only for dark chocolate loversLots of minerals in it.Good source of antioxidants. Lowers bad cholesterols. Numerous benefits Google it friends.Good for heart and high BP and diebetic patients. I give it to my father (60) also.May work as an antidepressant too.Not a sweetner. But  a nutrient rich food.First 2-3 days it was difficult to eat but now its good. After all health is wealth.Great work Amul #FIT INDIA MOVEMENTDo not discontinue production this chocolate AMUL like you did for 90% cocoa. Retain this as your permanent product. Please give micronutrients information also in the chocolate.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: All the chocolate lovers will love this chocolate! (P.S. I said chocolate lovers not sugar lovers.). It's absolutely one of the best dark chocolates in India. You can go for it only if you are a die hard fan of cocoa! Order delivered was absolutely fresh and was in the finest state.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Chocolate didn't melt in transit to Bhubaneswar( doesn't melt in transit to Bengaluru either).I love dark chocolate and can eat comfortably till Amul 90%, so wanted to try the ultimate 99% but found it a little too bitter for my taste so now I use it to make hot chocolate and it tastes much better than Hershey's. Just chop this chocolate into small pieces and stir it in your milk!

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Bitter is a very silple word, need some terrible word to describe this, i don't think i can go beyond 70% cocao... now i don't know what i will do with two bars.... on a lighter note: guys think twice before ordering, this is some 3rd degree torture not for general public use, might help military to torture terrorists. If i was a terrorist i would speak out everything after eating this in return of sugar..Jokes apart guys this is best and cheapest you can get, well done,  amul really the taste of india ❤❤❤

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's DARK AND BITTER, so if you're one of those sweet suger filled fake chocolate lovers, than this is out of your league, stick to your sugar candies.It's extremely hard to find anything this dark in India and even if there are, they're extremely pricy cause of low quantity production. Thanks to AMUL, now we have true dark chocolate at affordable price.NB: Loving the texture and feel of the chocolate. I'm really happy.Update: Finished 4 packs in less than 13 days. Ordered another 4. I just love the texture of the chocolate in my mouth. Truly in love ❤️

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's literally heavenly feeling to taste this chocolate. The chocolate is bitter to the core. It has no added suger. Sugery chocolate/fake chocolate lovers won't like it. It's for those people who has developed taste for cocoa/cacao over the period of time. It's made for chocolate connoisseur. Price is very less when compare to other brands in market. Plus Amul is well-known brand itself. Packaging was nice.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste....not sure if people consider this bitter, I personally do not feel so, may be very mildly. But the cocoa taste, flavor indeed feels great.I had earlier tasted upto 90% dark among the Amul chocolates (& of course couple of other makes including Lindt). In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul's progression in a way starting at 55% then 75, 90 and now 99% - in fact love the whole range by Amul. As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates. Thanks Amul. In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99% dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all - strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first.Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged - thanks to the seller. Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature....pretty cool - so no melting problem or anything for me.So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube (or sometimes two) after each meal - enjoyable in taste, and so sugar, no guilt!!

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: So basically, this is not the chocolate for everyone. At first when I tasted it, I badly regretted buying it. It tasted nowhere near the chocolate you would find in the market. There isn't even the slightest hint of any kind of sweetness in it and most people would find it gross. But the more I ate it, the more I could feel it's richness and realised how decadent it is. It's not a chocolate, it's THE chocolate.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Amul 99% cacao is the best dark/bitter chocolate available in India... excellent innovation by Amul. I may tell that I am not endorsing Amul or any other brand...just my own opinions. It has been proven that cacao is one of the healthiest superfoods on earth with amazing health benefits. It's full of antioxidants & flavonoids which increase lifespan. It's one of the highest sources of nitric oxide which dilates/widens & relaxes blood vessels of the body by reducing blockages, thereby supporting heart & brain health. Cacao is also anti inflammatory and anti carcinogenic, thus reduces cancer risk. Moreover, cacao is a natural blood thinner, so can prevent blood clots, reduce blood cholesterol & blood sugar and lower blood pressure. Overall Amul dark cacao chocolate has enormous health benefits...so we must be thankful to Amul for making such an awesome health food. Please ignore the negative and one star rated reviews as those people are ignorant and lack awareness. Requesting all the sugar lovers...please don't defame such a nice and healthy product by giving negative ratings and one star. I pity those innocent sweet toothed people which focus on tongue taste rather than general health. Again, I am not promoting Amul company or a representative of the same, these are my personal views & experience. Those who want to enhance quality of life and reduce onset of lifestyle/genetic diseases like cancer, diabetes, hypertension, stroke, heart attacks, cardiac arrest, etc must not think twice...just purchase the stuff & enjoy. Infact, Amul 99% Cacao Chocolate is a heavenly bliss with irresistible taste. It is indeed Delightful & Ambrosial. I am giving a five star rating to this authentic product...if there were 10 stars, I would have given full 10/10. Lastly, thanks to Amul & Amazon, too for providing such a nice superfood at my doorstep.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's dark, bitter but that's what the product is all about. Though it took almost 1 week for delivery, the chocolate didn't melt luckily. Good packaging by the seller.I fell the chocolate is not made with the finest of cocoa seeds. But I like it.

review: Bitter is a very silple word, need some terrible word to describe this, i don't think i can go beyond 70% cocao... now i don't know what i will do with two bars.... on a lighter note: guys think twice before ordering, this is some 3rd degree torture not for general public use, might help military to torture terrorists. If i was a terrorist i would speak out everything after eating this in return of sugar..Jokes apart guys this is best and cheapest you can get, well done,  amul really the taste of india ❤❤❤

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's DARK AND BITTER, so if you're one of those sweet suger filled fake chocolate lovers, than this is out of your league, stick to your sugar candies.It's extremely hard to find anything this dark in India and even if there are, they're extremely pricy cause of low quantity production. Thanks to AMUL, now we have true dark chocolate at affordable price.NB: Loving the texture and feel of the chocolate. I'm really happy.Update: Finished 4 packs in less than 13 days. Ordered another 4. I just love the texture of the chocolate in my mouth. Truly in love ❤️

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's literally heavenly feeling to taste this chocolate. The chocolate is bitter to the core. It has no added suger. Sugery chocolate/fake chocolate lovers won't like it. It's for those people who has developed taste for cocoa/cacao over the period of time. It's made for chocolate connoisseur. Price is very less when compare to other brands in market. Plus Amul is well-known brand itself. Packaging was nice.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste....not sure if people consider this bitter, I personally do not feel so, may be very mildly. But the cocoa taste, flavor indeed feels great.I had earlier tasted upto 90% dark among the Amul chocolates (& of course couple of other makes including Lindt). In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul's progression in a way starting at 55% then 75, 90 and now 99% - in fact love the whole range by Amul. As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates. Thanks Amul. In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99% dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all - strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first.Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged - thanks to the seller. Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature....pretty cool - so no melting problem or anything for me.So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube (or sometimes two) after each meal - enjoyable in taste, and so sugar, no guilt!!

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: So basically, this is not the chocolate for everyone. At first when I tasted it, I badly regretted buying it. It tasted nowhere near the chocolate you would find in the market. There isn't even the slightest hint of any kind of sweetness in it and most people would find it gross. But the more I ate it, the more I could feel it's richness and realised how decadent it is. It's not a chocolate, it's THE chocolate.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Amul 99% cacao is the best dark/bitter chocolate available in India... excellent innovation by Amul. I may tell that I am not endorsing Amul or any other brand...just my own opinions. It has been proven that cacao is one of the healthiest superfoods on earth with amazing health benefits. It's full of antioxidants & flavonoids which increase lifespan. It's one of the highest sources of nitric oxide which dilates/widens & relaxes blood vessels of the body by reducing blockages, thereby supporting heart & brain health. Cacao is also anti inflammatory and anti carcinogenic, thus reduces cancer risk. Moreover, cacao is a natural blood thinner, so can prevent blood clots, reduce blood cholesterol & blood sugar and lower blood pressure. Overall Amul dark cacao chocolate has enormous health benefits...so we must be thankful to Amul for making such an awesome health food. Please ignore the negative and one star rated reviews as those people are ignorant and lack awareness. Requesting all the sugar lovers...please don't defame such a nice and healthy product by giving negative ratings and one star. I pity those innocent sweet toothed people which focus on tongue taste rather than general health. Again, I am not promoting Amul company or a representative of the same, these are my personal views & experience. Those who want to enhance quality of life and reduce onset of lifestyle/genetic diseases like cancer, diabetes, hypertension, stroke, heart attacks, cardiac arrest, etc must not think twice...just purchase the stuff & enjoy. Infact, Amul 99% Cacao Chocolate is a heavenly bliss with irresistible taste. It is indeed Delightful & Ambrosial. I am giving a five star rating to this authentic product...if there were 10 stars, I would have given full 10/10. Lastly, thanks to Amul & Amazon, too for providing such a nice superfood at my doorstep.

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It's dark, bitter but that's what the product is all about. Though it took almost 1 week for delivery, the chocolate didn't melt luckily. Good packaging by the seller.I fell the chocolate is not made with the finest of cocoa seeds. But I like it.

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: I ordered amul fresh creme it was just look like this when I opened the package I didn't even used it once ...so regretful for buying this product

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: The cream is of good quality. See the fat percentage to choose cream for the type of cooking you need it for. This is good for everyday use. A tip to ensure it lasts mire than 2 days is to keep it right in front of the fridge cooling vent, this helps it last for a week or so. Freezing doesn't help, it changes the taste and texture.

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: General product but do check the manufacturing & expiry dates.

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: It is good for other dishes but not for whipped cream icing,I tried it for icing and as it is not a nondairy cream it had very little fat and thickness and more of liquidy milk which made the consistency wattery and think,Otherwise it is great for other dishes,for icing non-dairy whipped cream would be better

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: I tried making whipping cream with it and it really turned out well, used it for cake decoration and  it turned out really well 👌🏻😊

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: It is very good product to add creaminess and texture to add to dishes. The taste is very nice.

name: Amul-Fresh-Cream-250ml
review: Whilst initially the cream is thick.  Subsequently the content starts thinning out into thick milk like.  Guess if it comes I. Tins like other oversea product it might have better consistency.  Surely Thant would be at a higher price.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: Amul is a very old and trusted brand. I typically purchase Mother Dairy / Amul Ghee - depending upon which one is at a better price (per kg )or on offer :)As usual, good quality ghee. No issues at all. Amazon does good delivery in Mumbai, be it Prime Now or Pantry. So no complaints.Go for it - won't be disappointed.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: I NOT LIKED IT.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: Looks like a spoiled / duplicate product , packing date is 15th May 2020 the product isn't expired one

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: Guys dont order Amul ghee from amazon fresh the seller is selling some duplicate stuff.I got ill after having this.I hardly write reviews but this one i am writing just to warn all that don't purchase amul ghee from fresh at alllllll.You can see the picture.Even after putting it on burner it doesn't melt.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: 3rd time I've ordered this Ghee.*1st time: Ghee was perfect, it solidified, tasted gr8-directly & in my BulletProof Coffee.*2nd time: Tasted poor, directly & in my BPC, never solidified & my Mother said the same too.*3rd time: Thought the 2nd time was a batch problem. But the problem has repeated. It does not solidify, & TASTES EVEN WORSE (directly & indirectly) than the 2nd time.p.s. my coffee ingredients are the same.No More Amul Ghee, guess a lot of potential for adulteration within their scope of products & quality control. Mother Dairy, Dynamic much much better.Amul Ghee has lost a customer.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: Bad quality. I think Amul made this low quality product for online shopping perpose only.  Amul ghee from local shop, in tin container is GOOD.

name: Amul-Pure-Ghee-Pouch-1L
review: Poor quality..Seems as was adulterated..Fake product

name: Amul-Pro-500g-Pouch-Pack
review: I JUST LOVED THIS PRODUCT THERE IS NO COMPARISON OF THIS RIGHT NOW IN THE MARKET IN THE FLAVOUR OF CHOCOLATE MILK DRINK.ONLY HERSHEYS CHOCOLATE SYRUP COME CLOSE TO THIS WHICH IS EXPENSIVE & DIFFERENT PURPOSE.

name: Amul-Pro-500g-Pouch-Pack
review: The Best Health Drink for the whole family.Amul Pro is the only Health Drink available in the market at most economical Price Tag.And that too Made in India by Amul.

name: Amul-Pro-500g-Pouch-Pack
review: Best product comparison to Bournvita, Horlicks chocolate, low price , good test, better value of nutrition and little part of DHA also. Amul is Indian brand must purchase this product. Packaging good and fast delivery by Amazon. Thanks  Amazon

name: Amul-Pro-500g-Pouch-Pack
review: Due to price reason, I doubt it's effectiveness. Though I trust Amul a lot. Waiting for results. As far as flavour is concerned, it's awesome.

name: Amul-Pro-500g-Pouch-Pack

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: milk got spoiled when we boiled it. not upto the mark.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Excellent quality milk. Thick and tasty. Works very well for making curd at home. Ensure you boil and then cool it down to warm temperature before putting it down to make curd. Otherwise can be consumed without boiling. Thanks to Amul for making it available across India. Only drawback is the additional cost we have to pay compared to Nandini and other common brands.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Very convenient to store. One does't need to buy every day & assured quality. Curd is fantastic. I store 10ltrs & forget for 15 days.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: I got the expired pack..

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Tastes like normal pouch bag milk. Feels no difference unlike other brands which though taste good, sometimes are a lot thicker to seem real milk.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Same taste as the store bought Gold. Moreover, tetra pack is awesome as it can be recycled and hence, environment friendly. Though a little bit pricier than those plastic pouches yet worth it, considering our future.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Not like milk.its a cream coloured solution ( not white like natural milk or daily packed milk) likely soya milk as it's taste tells,and it sticks to walls of container.again a sign of some powdered or soya milk.not a good choice only an emergency option occasionally.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Sheer waste of money as the Milk got curdled on the last two occasions that I ordered.It appears that delivering the packets during this hot season without adequate precaution spoils the milk.Although the packet states that no refrigeration is required till opened, however it also mentions that the packets are to be stored in a cool place.Thus the careless transportation in an ordinary vehicle in hot weather is bound to have an adverse impact on the milk.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Spoilt. Perhaps it is being stored or transported in harsh sunlight or something. For the past several months, several of my orders of these have been spoilt.  Curdled milk,straight from a fresh carton,  each time.

name: Amul-Gold-Milk-Homogenised-Standardised
review: Got it for little less than ₹ 50Value for money in this price.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Never buy this.. giving duplicate product..its not original ghee rather mixture of oil and vanaspati..no aroma on cooking..taste too bad...and smells on heating

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: I ordered for patangali 2  1 leter pouches,,but 1 is correct weight and another is less waight

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: I am not satisfied with the quality of Ghee. It doesn't have any smell and it's very iight.  Mother Dairy ghee is far better than this. Overall it's a 50-50 purchase .

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Patanjali made cow milk deshi ghee is best of availed among all similar type of fmcg product, it taste was not so good but fair colour was same as normal home made deshi ghee have it also have a qr code which varifies that it is a original prodct made by patanjali so,finally I like to give a rating feedback to this deshi ghee product which is 08/10 it means 08 out of 10.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Just got this butter. I read nutritional information on the package and found that the amount of TRANS FAT does not match the description! The description indicates 0%, but actually 3%. For such a famous brand as Patanjali shamefully deceiving. I require update the nutritional information in product description!

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Hi All,As I cut opened the pack I was really amazed by the ghee quality. We usually assume patanjali products to be  low/poor quality since it is manufactured indigenously or may be because we are already habitual of using Costly products. You may find the price hike too much of this Ghee, I can assure you it is because the quality is really authentic. I do not have the images of the ghee now. Ghee is thick, pale white in color. And taste so Delicious. The aroma is so authentic.It has long shelf life. However, I have recently started making Full cream cow milk ghee at home.Will definitely recommend everyone to try this Ghee.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: No issue with quality of Ghee. But the 1 litre Ghee is supposed to be consumed in a span of 09 months and the product which you had sent, was made in Dec. 2017. Already 07 months have passed. It means we will have to consume this 1 litre of Ghee in a span of two months. We were expecting fresh packet.  Disappointed with the seller.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: This product is worst...They are using duplicate ghee in this parcel...They mixed many other things in ghee...I threw it outside...Hate this

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: First time i tried a patanjali product.. Its just waste of our hard earning money.. There is  nothing to say positively.. Its not a ghee.It dosent smell like ghee either taste.. Just like vanaspathi/cheap oil.. Dont try to buy this patanjali ghee.. Else ready to write a frusturated review like this😬

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-1L
review: Very bad. No smell at all.wasted my money.

review: No issue with quality of Ghee. But the 1 litre Ghee is supposed to be consumed in a span of 09 months and the product which you had sent, was made in Dec. 2017. Already 07 months have passed. It means we will have to consume this 1 litre of Ghee in a span of two months. We were expecting fresh packet.  Disappointed with the seller.

review: The shampoo do has natural ingredients like Amla, Hibiscus etc. it is affordable too. However, it is HIGHLY INEFFECTIVE in controlling hairfall or dandruff.  Also, you need to use more amount of shampoo for excessively oily or dirty hair.

name: Patanjali-Kanti-Natural-Cleanser-Shampoo
review: At first, I liked the smell of it. It is very herbal.Unlike other shampoo with tons of chemicals on it, I would recommend this as it is herbal based.Also one other thing about this is It has Sunflower oil embedded inside it so it also gives a shiny oil look in your hair.Quality product from Patanjali

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: There are very few Ghee in market which does not have trans fats! Be it Amul, Mother dairy, Nestle, all have trans fats which are very very bad for health. Surpirsingly, patanajali ghee is without trans fats!

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: Worst ghee that is coming in Market. It tastes, smells and looks like dalda. I am sure its 100% dalda

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: Tried almost all Ghee brands available in the market but I always have to come back to Patanjali Ghee. I didn't find any other brand to give the same flavor and texture.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: Patanjali Ghee is not that pure or real Ghee smell like expected.It's like ordinary and looks like refined oil mixed with pure ghee.In comparison Nandini ghee or Jharana Ghee is better than this.Next time will try Amul or some organic brand or make at Home if I need pure ghee.I know how does the pure ghee smells like. Conclusion - Patanjalii is not upto the mark...

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: No matter what you think of Patanjali.But some products are just too good. The best of them is this ghee.The smell, taste and quality. , it's a must in every kitchen.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: I generally like Patanjali products but really didn’t like this Ghee. The gravity is not good and this doesn’t feel like what original ghee should be like.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: No where near to the pure Cow Ghee. I dont know why people are crazy about it.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: This does not have aroma of a good ghee. Color is also yellow like butter. I do not recommend for people looking to buy pure ghee for kids.

name: Patanjali-Cows-Ghee-500ml
review: Patanjali Products are reliable.  However the flavour of Ghee is less when compared to other products in the market.  May be because there are no additives and the process of preparing may be different

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This product from patanjali can be a nightmare for your skin. Although the fragrance is good and it is a cheap product but that's all. I have normal skin and am not very prone to pimples. But after applying this gel for a couple of days, I started having pimples on my face. First I ignored, thinking it could be a result of the weather. But then the pimples started increasing. I immediately discontinued the product. But still I am unable to get rid of the pimples.

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I use this gel as my night cream and I am quite happy with it. It doesn't make me a beauty queen overnight, but moisturizes my skin the non-intrusive way, and thats what I need. The impact is for a short time, as it would 'naturally' be. Its a good replenishment especially in summers.Only thing I think they can improve is change the packaging and use a bit high quality one. The cap is quite sharp to open and close. This can hurt if not operated carefully. Secondly, its a tube. You usually, habitually, keep the tube inverted with cap down to take out the gel. When you open with cap down, the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk, throwing some of gel around, wasting as well as messing things around at times. I now, open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out. I learnt after some messes. This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel.

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: Very very very good for skin and hair ..i really appreciate it..if you have suffer minor skin infections , pimple ,acne and hair fall problem then go for it

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: Good gelIt really prevents pimplesGood for all types of skinCan use as night cream as well as primer

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This is the best one for my skin type. In summers I have a acne prone combination skin and in winter's I have a sensitive dry skin 🙂 it is a miracle for my skin. And it is affordable too 😁 peeps of my skin type just give it a shot. Just wash your face with low ph cleanser at night and apply it. leave it on till the next day mrng. Your skin will be so supple and soft. My acne got reduced eventually in 1month 😘

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: The product i buy for rs 90 but when i received it was charged about 140rs i donno why..After using it i got alot of pimples on my face disappointed with patanjali...👎

When you open with cap down, the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk, throwing some of gel around, wasting as well as messing things around at times. I now, open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out. I learnt after some messes. This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel.

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: Very very very good for skin and hair ..i really appreciate it..if you have suffer minor skin infections , pimple ,acne and hair fall problem then go for it

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This is the best one for my skin type. In summers I have a acne prone combination skin and in winter's I have a sensitive dry skin 🙂 it is a miracle for my skin. And it is affordable too 😁 peeps of my skin type just give it a shot. Just wash your face with low ph cleanser at night and apply it. leave it on till the next day mrng. Your skin will be so supple and soft. My acne got reduced eventually in 1month 😘

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I have tried various other creams/gels on my skin for a year but nothing worked until I used this one. Acne marks started getting lighter almost within a week after using this twice a day as per instructions:)

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This product from patanjali can be a nightmare for your skin. Although the fragrance is good and it is a cheap product but that's all. I have normal skin and am not very prone to pimples. But after applying this gel for a couple of days, I started having pimples on my face. First I ignored, thinking it could be a result of the weather. But then the pimples started increasing. I immediately discontinued the product. But still I am unable to get rid of the pimples.

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I use this gel as my night cream and I am quite happy with it. It doesn't make me a beauty queen overnight, but moisturizes my skin the non-intrusive way, and thats what I need. The impact is for a short time, as it would 'naturally' be. Its a good replenishment especially in summers.Only thing I think they can improve is change the packaging and use a bit high quality one. The cap is quite sharp to open and close. This can hurt if not operated carefully. Secondly, its a tube. You usually, habitually, keep the tube inverted with cap down to take out the gel. When you open with cap down, the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk, throwing some of gel around, wasting as well as messing things around at times. I now, open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out. I learnt after some messes. This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Was delivered the incorrect product variant.I purchased the Pine fragrance—I received the lime variant instead.It's not a small difference. It matters to me. I hate the smell.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Best. Smells awesome. And It's Dettol. So I can trust it blindly.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: I mainly use this for spraying on bugs n spiders at house, mixed with water and vinegar. Sometimes for bath and washing baby clothes. Safe on hands and overall a useful product.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Good fresh smell, but be sure to dilute this before using.Useful on disinfecting things like Clothes, bathing, door handles or even on your smartphone's screen if its really dirty just clean it with damp cloth apply little of this. Always dilute before use. For stronger applications use the brown one.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Dettol is always the best...this new disinfectant cleanser is good for cleaning household things... I divide the bottle in three parts & add water in it to make 3 liters . With spray holder bottle I spray on the things which comes thru delivery, household goods& of course doors & handles...like it ...moreover it’s a pack of two. Value for money..

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: A refreshing change from the original dettol which has a very antiseptic smell. This has a nice fragrance and I'm sure has the same Dettol protection that we've trusted over the years. Wish it were a little more economical though

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Its not an antiseptic like regular dettol, its disinfectant used for mobbing floors. So it should not be used for shaving purposes

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Supply water in Delhi has foul smell, this liquid certainly makes that smell gone! Plus killing the germs!I use it daily for bathing and washing clothes too!Online deal is good as I bought this at discounted price!Both variants smell fine! Blue and green

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Damaged product found seal broken and difference in quantity in each bottle

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Multi-Use-Hygiene-Liquid
review: Good for floors but won't recommended for daily bath or baby bath and in washing because of fragrance. The original Dettol liquid is recommended for bath and washing.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: As Civilisation came to a stick end, the remaining Survivors fought over the last piece of the famed Antiseptic, claimed to be effective against all manners of Germs that covered the world. Finally, only a handful remained to satiate the desire of those who would be quick enough to steal these. Was it then worth it, for one man, to serve his own self, to grab the last Dettol? Over those that truely needed it, like healers of the sick people, or seek the ire of hoarders, who wanted the Last Dettol at any cost? The answer is yes, for not only this Dettol is effective as an Antiseptic, but also smells nice.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Original product

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: We all know the Dettol brand.  I grew up with this brand back home in Sydney.  I am not fond of the alleged disinfectants at the local markets.  Good to see Dettol expanded.  I use this in my floor wash, you only need a very tiny amount as it soaps up,  I do mix it with a little lizzol to other floor cleaner.  Great for the bathroom and kitchen do.  Happy customer!!

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Dettol is no doubt a good brand for disinfectant liquids. As compare to dettol original, this Lime fragrance gives a fresh feel after using. Can use for floors, kitchen tiles, bathroom, laundry & shaving purpose. I use this disinfectant liquid with water in this COVID-19 pandemic to wash products and spray on doors, door bell, all surfaces etc. We can use this for bathing purpose also. It is multi-purpose cleaner is safe on skin and on all surfaces. Nice way to disinfect your home.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Protect your loved ones from virus like COVID 19 dettol disinfectant liquid is one of the best solution. Although it's scentless but you can use it as a laundry sanitizer or to disinfect anything which comes under human contact.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: I have never purchased this variety before. I have always used dettol antiseptic liquid. But during lock-down it was vanished from local medicine stores. So I moved online, it was even difficult to get one there also. However, after lots of attempt I got 1. After using this for shaving purpose I think it is equally good as antiseptic variety. It leaves a freshness felling after washing face with this. This leaves a refreshing fragrance if mixed with bathing water. I am very much pleased after using this variety and will buy this again in future.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Great product from Dettol. As advertised, it can be used in bathing, shaving, laundry disinfection, floor cleaning, kitchen & bathroom cleaning, refrigerator and cleaning other substances.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: To be honestly i have been using regular brown colour antiseptic liquid and i loved it so i thought to buy lemon scent liquid in hope that it will be much good than last one. But when i saw it's much sticky liquid and when we add it in water it goes like invisible.. Very dissapointed -_- last one brown was more better but this one thumbs down.. Don't buy dont go on reviews.. I was purchased on reviews too.. U will regret once u use.. scent 2/10Thickness 2/10..really dont buy dont waste ur money on lemon.. Buy brown liquid

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: There are plenty of other brands which are similar to Dettol but the question is whether you can trust it or not.  In my home the product is used as mixture with water for rinsing clothes, mopping floor and as spray-liquid to disinfect. It is a also a part of the first-aid box. The fresh lime fragrance smells great.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Cleaner-Home-Fresh
review: Dettol is no doubt an authentic product. This Dettol Liquid is the totally different from the original antiseptic liquid. It's smell not Very strong like Antiseptic Liquid,it's lime fresh aroma make thik product attractive. In this pandamic Situation this Product is Value of money Product. I got this Product at Rs. 315/-  where the printing price is Rs. 347/-The delivery was little bit slow, I have no issues in it, Finally I would like to say thank you Amazon and it's whole entire team. You are doing a great job for us in this situation, hats of to You.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: First i thought its a Great value in such low price,but after using it i realised it a fake one guys. The product is diluted. Better to give some more money and buy the real product rather than saving money and getting a fake one!

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Original Product with good packaging, longer expiry date and less price than usual MRP. A must buy product for every household. Got it at 151/- Rs.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Dettol's quality is the best. However, in value, it is available on Amazon only on MRP. But in general the 1.5 liter refill pack is not available in the market. So if you are a Amazon Prime member then you can buy it

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Got empty sooner than expected lol. But good.stuffEdit: this time there was a problem. After half the pack was empty, the liquid is totally rubbish. It doesn't lather at all !The liquid at the bottom smelled like phenylRealised this is fake  tampered package.When will India ever be free of this malpractice and adultery !Very disappointed. Won't buy again

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Its dilutated. I ignored the comments that said the product is fake, but after I received the product I noticed colour of the soap is lighter than the soap that I bought from the local store and the soap is watery ke less viscous. Being a student I thought this will be value for money kinda deak but this is a fake product and the seller is looting customers

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Great deal and good packaging.  Packaging so impressive.  Words are too short for defining.  Thanks Amazon

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: The seal of the cap was opened when received.Also, the quantity seem to be less than actually written on the product as seal was opened.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Seal was brokenAnd totally damaged packet..

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: You might think you would buy a refill instead of a new bottle to save money or even reduce plastic use.However do not buy this refill. It is not the original dettol handwash.As soon as i refilled bottle and started using i noticed first color is lighter. Noticeably lighter. Then i noticed that the scent is very faint compared to original one from bottle.I ignored it because in times like these you cant be picky.Then two days later i noticed my skin peeling off like it never has before. I have used handwash for a long time it has never happened to me.I wouldn't even risk givin this pack away to someone for free because it is awful. So it will end up in dustbin.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: The product packaging was good. Inside the package, you get one 1500ml dettol liquid handwash.Now, there is one thing I'm extremely upset about which is that the liquid seems diluted. It's like someone mixed water in it. It doesn't feel like dettol at all. I'm not saying that it is fake or not but that's what I got. About the scent, it's not very strong. It's value for money only if you get it at good discount. I got it for 188rs.Anyways, if you find this review "Helpful" please do let me know. Thank you.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: First i thought its a Great value in such low price,but after using it i realised it a fake one guys. The product is diluted. Better to give some more money and buy the real product rather than saving money and getting a fake one!

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Original Product with good packaging, longer expiry date and less price than usual MRP. A must buy product for every household. Got it at 151/- Rs.

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Dettol's quality is the best. However, in value, it is available on Amazon only on MRP. But in general the 1.5 liter refill pack is not available in the market. So if you are a Amazon Prime member then you can buy it

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Got empty sooner than expected lol. But good.stuffEdit: this time there was a problem. After half the pack was empty, the liquid is totally rubbish. It doesn't lather at all !The liquid at the bottom smelled like phenylRealised this is fake  tampered package.When will India ever be free of this malpractice and adultery !Very disappointed. Won't buy again

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Its dilutated. I ignored the comments that said the product is fake, but after I received the product I noticed colour of the soap is lighter than the soap that I bought from the local store and the soap is watery ke less viscous. Being a student I thought this will be value for money kinda deak but this is a fake product and the seller is looting customers

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: Great deal and good packaging.  Packaging so impressive.  Words are too short for defining.  Thanks Amazon

name: Dettol-Liquid-Refill-Original-1500
review: The seal of the cap was opened when received.Also, the quantity seem to be less than actually written on the product as seal was opened.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: More of an air freshener and smells good

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I have two small kids at home and they are continuously falling ill these days. So, I bought Dettol disinfected spray last week and very much satisfied with it. It has a very nice and mild scented fragrance. I tried it inside my car, washroom and kids room as well. It leaves the place very fresh and nice.Although, there is no way to check whether it kills the germs or not but still I think it worth to try once. All the freshners, which I had tried before, came with very hard scented and irritating smell. But this is very mild and soothing.One should give it a try for sure as it is pocket friendly too.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Was looking for a good disinfectant spray as I have toddlers and keeping them safe from flu and virus is really tough. So while browsing Dettol caught my eye and without a second thought got it. It has mild scent and really easy to use. It evaporates in 15-20 seconds and so saves time. I Use it when I go out especially in public toilets. So convenient and travel friendly. Will definitely recommend.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Alcohol content is only 57% whereas I was given to understand its 72% . The Amazon listing does not mention alcohol content which is very important as anything less than 60% is ineffective to kill viruses like Covid -19 . Ideally should be 70% alcohol for it to be totally effective

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I have orderd two spray bottle and recieved only one cap. One spray os with cap and one without. Smell is also not so good.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Received unsealed cans. Cap fell off easily & nozzle was unsealed. Raises doubt how a brand like dettol can sell unsealed items. Not sure if original.The sprayer design is also different from my earlier purchases. Earlier the item had a nice hooded spray mechanism without cap. This one is a regular type like with cap (similar to perfumes & savlon spray)

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I ordered this product because of Covid19. But used it after 2 weeks and found that this will kill you as well. After you spray it will get into your respiratory system and you won't be able to breath. The smell is very harsh. It suffocates you. I followed there guidelines and wore mask while spraying on items. But the spray will remain in air for a while and you will inhale it. It took 1 hour for me to come to my normal breathing. This was my personal experience. I won't suggest this product to any one. Please do not buy this product

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Be 100% sure, when you use a dettol products. Far better from others spray present in the market now.New improved container spray with a pleasent fragrance. Carry it inside your bag and stay safe.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I used this product first time and I'm very much satisfied with this multi-purpose disinfectant spray that kills bacteria and viruses by eliminating odour causing bacteria . We can use this product in bedroom , toilet , kitchen , mattress etc . I recommend this product because it is very hygienic  and it also gives pleasant fragrance after every use.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Dettol Surface Disinfectant Spray is good  for killing germs. But few points are worth noting.1. New spray bottle comes with a cap, whereas old bottle comes without cap, which is discontinued by dettol.2. Most of the material inside is gas, very less quantity of alcohol.3. New spray pump has very less spray power(too weak) when compared to old one.4. Dettol is widely used by people inspite of the fact that it comes with 60% alcohol, whereas other brands like savlon comes with 62% alcohol.5. Fragrance is strong.6. Cap is not properly fitted and comes off very easily.

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: More of an air freshener and smells good

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Savlon liquid is a must for home. It is far better than so called Dettol as savlon has CHG and cetrimide. It has better efficacy against germs but the advertisement by HUL have made people sick so they buy dettol.It doesn't burn skin when applied on cuts / wound. Better smell. Also an Indian Product.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Much better than dettol, doesn't burn, Doctor has recommended this over dettol anyway. Use it multiple ways - regular use of cuts and bruises, use it to add to floor wash bucket and other cleaning needs.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Much needed product during this pandemic

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Was waiting for a long long time to get my hands on this post pandemic. It's still very difficult to find in local stores or any other online shops and finally it's now available on Amazon.Extreme useful and versatile liquid to have at home which can be used for first aids, bathing, shaving, disinfecting clothes or even for floor cleaning. Do dilute the liquid as per the instructions mentioned on the product label.It contains Chlorhexidine Gluconate Solution I. P. 1.5% v/v and strong Cetrimide Solution B.P. equivalent to Cetrimide I.P. 3.0% w/v to provide antiseptic and disinfectant properties. This duo not only more effective than Dettol's (Original Brown liquid) Chloroxylenol but also doesn't sting after applying on skin.There's also now a Multipurpose Disinfectant cleaner from Savlon to compete against Dettol's Multipurpose Liquid (Green, Blue bottle) which is more suitable as disinfectant if you want nice fragrance but also a lot more expensive  https://www.amazon.in/dp/B08CL5P72J/, stick to this Original Savlon if you don't want much fragrance.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Best but price is on mrp  no discount

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Product is aqurate, original, recently manufacture. Seal is ok, good condition, good packaging. Completely satisfied.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Savlon is the modern antiseptic. It has a no burn formula. I use it everywhere. On clothes, in the floor cleanser and add to the bathing water . Great to see it in Amazon.

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: I gave this a try as dettol antiseptic was not available. Not sure about effectiveness. But unlike dettol, water turns orange in colour upon using savlon and cant be used for laundry especially for white clothes. It doesnt stain clothes but gives a very mild peachy tint. Coming to scent, i read some reviews where it was mentioned that smell is better than dettol. But i  dont feel the difference.  In fact i prefer dettol smell, may be because we were using it since long..

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: I have doubt, is this original or duplicate product..May b duplicate one...

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Smells like strong chemical, not at all a pleasant smell as some reviews say. We used it for a nappy wash for our baby and the only thing happening is getting an orange colour share on the dress. This has a bad smell if you think Dettol's smell is bad, then this is horrible. There is no need to buy a product only because it is made by an Indian company. You may see this pattern on positive comments do not get tricked with it.

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: 100 % value for money .1 ) nice packaging2 ) on time delivery3 ) nice product4 ) beutiful presentation

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: I have purchased it via subscribing this product in 195+ bucks. Though Rs.165 is mentioned on the product. If I add GST and substract promotion, price would not go beyond 185+.I totally dissatisfied with it.

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: Dettol soap's are very nice and it contains antibacterial properties and antiseptic properties which kills bacteria. Dettol soap's are available in many fragrance. which are very nice to use. When we take bath with "Dettol"soap's our skin feels refreshed.  Dettol sops are especially made for kiling bacteria present on our skin. It is also useful for handwashing not only Dettol soap's but Dettol hand wash is also very nice.I recommend every body to use Dettol soap as they are very good and contains very nice fragrance. Thank you for reading my review. I hope it may help you to make a best choice.

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: The quality of the product is very good. Buying dettol soap in a special offer on Amazon is always beneficial

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: This soap is really hard to find, unless you live in certain parts where you can find it. I love the antibacterial properties of the soap it keeps my skin really clean in the summer and it works wonders for people like myself who are suffering from Hidradenitis. The smell can be a bit off putting (it basically smells like Pine-Sol) but it doesn't linger on your skin. Definetly worth a try!

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: to be honest, I bought this here because it was out of stock at shops near my area..Thanks to Amazon I found it with a one-day-delivery.. good packaging..- been using Dettol for many years now, good at germ protection.. great soap..- Dettol is always good, let it be the soap or liquid hand wash..- happy with the product..

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: I am received my order thats have past more then one year from his mfg. Date why current mfg. Date product is not sended

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: This is a fake product with an original coverFirst i thought its a Great value in such low price,but after using it i realized it a fake one guys. The product is duplicate. Better to give some more money and buy the real product rather than saving money and getting a fake one!So please don't buy this product

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: Good

name: Dettol-Original-Protection-Bathing-125gm
review: I have been using Dettol from the last 15 years but trust me this is a fake product with an original cover,it smells bad and it is allergic and bites your skin.Waste of money,this product has broken my trust for Amazon,I never expected they will cheat customers.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Already using dettol lime fresh (green) from its launch which is a great product but this menthol cool (blue) is best

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Very effective. Active ingredients are  quaternary ammonium chloride compounds which are a very potent and effective disinfectant - you can find these in most non-bleach disinfectant solutions. This is not the same as Dettol antiseptic used for skin so do not use it for that purpose. I am glad that Dettol introduced this as it was difficult to find purpose-made disinfectant concentrates of this formulation - the alternative was Amway Pursue which is not only much more expensive but would involve the hassle of dealing with a pushy Amway salesperson. Anyways, this one has a strong menthol smell and a highly effective disinfectant so fantastic for household use. Also works for laundry, but use it as a pre-wash, with a full wash cycle afterwards to clean out any residues.Also, a word of caution with this and any other disinfectants - please use it wisely and not indiscriminately as overuse not only can damage the environment but kill of beneficial microorganisms and cause harmful ones to develop resistance.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: This is one of the best disinfectant I have ever used. It has a strong menthol smell which I just love. This is a multipurpose liquid ,which can be used to clean laundry, wipe the floor, used while shaving to cleanse the razor, kitchen and bathroom cleaning, can be added to bathing water while taking a bath (those who don't mind menthol smell). Mind you, this is not the good old detail antiseptic liquid which comes with the clear bottle and green cap,which  is handy for cuts and wounds. This is an disinfectant liquid used for household cleaning. I use this in the washing machine along with the normal liquid detergent and let me tell you,my clothes smell amazing after wash.  I would recommend you all to try this if you like strong menthol smell. I just love it.. 5 stars for the product.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Best for during this hot day and pain in ass corona virus. If  Want to feel fresh , add this on and take bath. Perfect to maintain ur  hygiene And feel fresh during this summer. Stay safe

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: I am juz happy to tey this out. It has strong mint flavour with sweet essence balanced for my usage in bathroom. Stays perfectly long for washroom and bathroom specially places which are more closed and secluded. Its essense could be felt after 12 hrs also. Trust me. I seldomly rate anyone. Its a good for my daily usages. A change from orignal 30 years old flavour :-) try it.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Pretty cool and innovative stuff from Dettol. The minty flavor and then it gives tingling effects on the body.It's usually expensive than the lemon one but I suggest buy it when Amazon gives Especially Cloudtail India offers discount.  They are just amazing. You name it. They have it.Back to the product. That cool sensation with antiseptic is a must try and must buy.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: This is a nice and innovative product from Reckitt Benckiser. Amazon deserves thanks because this is not available in local medicine shops. Those who are complaining that this is not as strong as the original Dettol Antiseptic Liquid are comparing apples and oranges. This scented Dettol Disinfectant Liquid is ideal for baths and imparting a freshness to just washed clothes.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Supply water in Delhi has foul smell, this liquid certainly makes that smell gone! Plus killing the germs!I use it daily for bathing and washing clothes too!Online deal is good as I bought this at discounted price!

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Every household needs Dettol products and especially those which have kids around.This new Dettol disinfectant with menthol fragrance leaves a fresh feeling and smell in your entire house when used along with cleaning water!Recommended for cleaning and washing.

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Now I have tried all variants of dettol liquids and putting aside the added benefits of the antiseptic version, this one is the best among them. One capfull in a bucket of water and you will have the freshest of baths. Scent not as strong as antiseptic, but quite good. Recieved sealed bottle and next day delivery for prime and mfg date is the same month of order date, so really happy with the purchase.

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Highest 'TFM' content grade 1 soap. Recommended by the doctors.Though Nivea launched it's own soap flagship in india few days back which is in fact might have beaten cinthol in terms of quality.But for the price range,cinthol is the best.The quality of the soap is determined by its 'TFM' content which is almost same in nivea and cinthol but nivea also moisturizes the skin from within along with the cleansing.Anyways,both are the best soaps available in the market just with a little price differences.Please don't use soaps like pears and all,they are fooling the indian customers with lowest 'tfm' content.Google it for more info!

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I have used various brands available in market bit never satisfied with them so every time I used to purchase a different product. This time decided to purchase this product and now writing this review after using this product for those who haven't tried this product. I'll recommend them to try once. Now going to subscribe this product as found this made for me.About product : Scent is excellent keeps you fresh,No issues with skin... Giving it a 5 starTFM content determines the quality of soap and it has high TFM

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Well I loved the soap. The smell is available till the soap gets thinner, which is not to be found on many others.Will surely recommend it.

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Nice fragrance and comfortable to use.Not the best price.

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: This is a good old product of Godrej. It has 79% TFM. It is a very nominal soap that neither dry out your skin nor makes it quite oily. It suits all skin type and it is dermatologic ally recommended for allergies, rashes and other skin problems. For one bath per day it comes almost for 25 days. Has a pleasant fragrance and recommended for all above 3 years.

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: It's not my type soap. Fragrance doesn't stay that longer... As I 'read' in description. Plus not that strong either. Yeah.. but it's good soap to take bath with. I expected more. You know, PARK AVENUE.. that's why I gave it 4 Stars.
