name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Highest 'TFM' content grade 1 soap. Recommended by the doctors.Though Nivea launched it's own soap flagship in india few days back which is in fact might have beaten cinthol in terms of quality.But for the price range,cinthol is the best.The quality of the soap is determined by its 'TFM' content which is almost same in nivea and cinthol but nivea also moisturizes the skin from within along with the cleansing.Anyways,both are the best soaps available in the market just with a little price differences.Please don't use soaps like pears and all,they are fooling the indian customers with lowest 'tfm' content.Google it for more info!

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I have used various brands available in market bit never satisfied with them so every time I used to purchase a different product. This time decided to purchase this product and now writing this review after using this product for those who haven't tried this product. I'll recommend them to try once. Now going to subscribe this product as found this made for me.About product : Scent is excellent keeps you fresh,No issues with skin... Giving it a 5 starTFM content determines the quality of soap and it has high TFM

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Well I loved the soap. The smell is available till the soap gets thinner, which is not to be found on many others.Will surely recommend it.

name: Cinthol-Original-Soap-100g-Pack
review: This is a good old product of Godrej. It has 79% TFM. It is a very nominal soap that neither dry out your skin nor makes it quite oily. It suits all skin type and it is dermatologic ally recommended for allergies, rashes and other skin problems. For one bath per day it comes almost for 25 days. Has a pleasant fragrance and recommended for all above 3 years.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100-Pack
review: I prefer cinthol soap amongst all the soaps available. Its fragrance is very good. This product 'Cinthol Cool' is so good. I have already used it thats why I ordered a pack of 8 Cinthol Cool soaps. Packaging is good and all the soaps are in good condition. You can also try 'Cinthol Confidence +' soap.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100-Pack
review: There's nothing extraordinary in this soap.. don't expect much for it's "cool" name tag..I didn't feel anything "cool" while using this soap..overall not that bad but also not that good.. fragrance is avg(to me)..

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100-Pack
review: I have used different variants of cinthol but this one highly disappointed me. On the scale of 10 fragrance 2/10, Cooling effect 3/10 It melts very easily. I am not sure if it is original or not. I have stopped using this soap...I don't know what to do with the rest of them....

review: For Summers it's just great... Feels cool cool... And yeah fragnace lasts for long enough. Using for past 2years.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: What a gem from an old and trusted Indian brand. And such great value for money.The fragrance is nice powdery scent which is refreshing without being overpowering. The soap’s cleansing is good, not great. But it has a nice creaminess which is far beyond its modest price. In fact, it has a nice natural creaminess, and not the slipperiness of a Dove. Also, it seems to long last. A clear winner and will be a regular feature on my bathing rack.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I liked the quality of the soap as it wasn't getting too chunky even if it stays wet for most part of the day. BUT, the DEO fragrance in body after taking bath with this soap *** All those are just marketing GIMMICKS. It's got no great fragrance than other soaps and actually it's just too minimal. Anyhow the product feels like of good quality.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I really had liked the packing of this soap. But more than that, I remember as soon as I had unpacked it, the surprising fresh smell coming from it was amazing.The soap foam feels soft, rich and white. It moisturizes the skin perfectly. I have an oily skin so I wanted a soap which can balance the skin moisture, not over moisturizing not drying out the skin. And this soap pretty much does that.Also, it lasts for a good time, also most soaps give up their foaming capability as soon as they become small, but this one still gives great lather. Would recommend to everyone.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Nice smelling scented bath soap from Cinthol. The scent lingers for a while even after washing off and leaves the bathroom also smelling great. Besides that it does its job of cleaning as it should. So full points there. Only thing is I was somewhat misguided and ordered a smaller pack when I needed a larger one.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: Nice quality product. Great product. Buying all the product from Amazon Pantry regularly.Thank you Amazon for such great quality products at such an affordable rate.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I thought the product might be black or charcoal colour but it's a regular white one. The scent is not that great and didn't feel any difference btw normal average soap and this one. I feel the lime one is better than this. Its just a good marketing and nothing else.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: I placed order 4+1 soaps.But I have received without seal pack with 4 No's soaps only. Now how can get remaining soap.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: The soap is ok for bathing, no scent at all, more drier. The green one from cinthol is much better.

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: For a long time I was searching for Indian soap equal to USA Ivory soap or the soap you get in Holiday Inn Hotels. Here it is!!!! Thank you Cinthol!

name: Cinthol-Confidence-Soap-100g-Pack
review: While the discount was only Rs 7, I have no complaints as Amazon delivered this in peak Covid-19. Thank you to the delivery person. Soap is tried and tested and one of the best available in India for summer season with the DEO.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: After blindly using this soap for *years* it suddenly struck me that there is zero cooling effect in this soap now and by now I mean 2-3 years.I started using cinthol cool 6-7 years ago as a kid when I used to think how awesome is this soap (with that tingling cooling after sensation) I felt that this soap is way underrated because of that and the signature smell of it. But now I have realised that the cooling part is ZERO. And the fragrance is bland and doesn't last long.Either this soap is fake because I've been continuously ordering this soap online in saver pack of 4/5 soaps from Amazon (but the seller being a trusty one at that 🤔) or Godrej has changed the chemical composition of this soap.Either Godrej should bring a "stronger" version of cinthol cool soap or I should look for better alternatives because this soap isn't what it used to be once.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: I bought this product because I was experiencing some bad prickly heat and thought the menthol would help. Although I don't feel the 'minty' feeling I was hoping for, I am still well pleased. The scent is very nice and refreshing but not over-bearing like it should only be used by MALES, not medicinal smelling. I don't feel as though my skin is dry and cracking off. And the prickly heat symptoms are gone. I like this product, I will be suggesting it to my friends and family.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: ONE OF THE WORST PRODUCTS WHICH I RECEIVED. THIS CINTHOL BATH COOL SOAP HAS NO FRAGRANCE, NO COOL EFFECTS AT ALL. SHOULD NOT PURCHASED BY ANYBODY. THE PACKET IS SHOWING THE DATE IS 01.2020. BUT I THINK IT MUCH MUCH OLDER DUE TO IT'S NO FRAGRANCE. I CANNOT RETURN IT BECAUSE I AM TRYING TO USE ONE OF THIS.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: In television advertisement, the color of the soap is shown as transparent as glass.But when I bought it, the color of the soap was in blue shade.I had to buy around 5 soaps.This is totally a cheating experience by the manufacturer.Did not expect such a fraud experience.

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: Decent Soap. Very fresh and nice. Gives good amount of lather. But not the best flavor of Cinthol according to me. I like other flavors better. Cinthol is my fav soap. 😊

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: Has absolutely no perfume at all... and it is blue in colour not transparent from as it is shown in Cinthol Ad.Total waste

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: This soap fluxes so fast even when you put it in a separate soap case and when you apply that melted soap, some part of it is stuck on your body specially on chest region and if you have large chest hair it will trouble you later.

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: This is not the same product as advertised. I received a Steax Vitariche gloss serum instead of Streax pro Vitagloss as the product name suggests. Called CS to get the refund and since i had closed my bank account since the order was placed i wanted the refund to come through amazon pay. However Amazon rep Aniket and the supervisor Krishna were absolutely unhelpful and went against common sense to keep telling me that the refund will only be processed to the closed bank account and the bank will issue me a DD. When i called them out on their lack of common sense they kept repeating themselves. Finally decided to give away the product than to deal with Amazon for a refund. This shows how base Amazon’s customer service is and a good sign for all to avoid using Amazon if you value your money and time.

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: No doubt, product is awesome and available at very reasonable price in comparison to other serums and even better than those.But Amazon or Streax, can you tell me how to extract it without it's upper cap??Obviously, It may be a fault either by Manufacturing Company or Amazon while packaging.But overall, I am not finding a solution that how to popup serum out of the bottle?

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: Best serum ....smell is toooo good...I realy liked a lott...just take a small quatity f serum and aply al over the hair before u go fr straighten...as per the description it realy protect the hair from damage...thumbs up fr the product

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: Minimal effort required to tame frizzy hair with this serum. Hair has nice shiny smooth look and soft to touch. Pleasant scent. Has same good effect on damp hair as well as completely dried hair. Overall 'thumbs up' for this product.

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: I've used this serum on my normal hair and chemically straightened hair, as well as seen results on colored hair. And honestly at this price, it never disappointed me. Though the texture is quite thin compared to a lot of other hair serums, but I like how it does not feel heavy on my hair and just a pump of it is enough to dab on my medium length hair. This does the basic job of a hair serum from detangling to providing moisture to the ends of the hair and since it goes a long way, so thumbs up from my side. And to my surprise, the new variant - vitariche gloss is way better than the previous one and this comes with nutty fragrance, which I totally love!

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: In the package the product did not have a cap as shown in the picture and naturally it was leaking in the box. and I can not be sure of the originality of the same!This item is not returnable by policy, which is understood by nature of the product. But in these cases there should be option to return damaged product. Had bought the item from cloudtail so do expect better experience.

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: It actually provides a very shiny effect while protecting your hair.And it leaves them with a very pleasant fragrance  💕💕💕💕

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: I’ve been using this serum for past couple of years and have purchased it for the sixth time recently so was forced to drop a comment automatically. This is the best serum available for the purpose. I’ve got thick hair so before applying wax or blow drying, I need something to protect them and it serves the purpose really well.

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: Worth its price. Make hair soft and silky and last more than 2 days.The way I discovered this was I had applied this after bath to get ready for a function, it gives a finishing shine to my hairs. Next day as well I don’t need to put extra serum.Amazon delivered this product without any leakage/spills whatsoever... thank you Amazon ans the seller.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair.Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family.Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos.Coming to this product let me review as under:Pros:1  Gives good color/highlights if kept for about 45 minutes. (note: 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair).2 The color stays for about 8-9 months and lightens with time.3 After about 1-1.5 months of applying this hair color, I would suggest to use henna/mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs...which will not only nourish your hair, but also give very good result for highlighted hairs.4 Personal tip- If you are not satisfied with colored/highlighted hair and want to remove it, use anti-dandruff shampoo 3-4 times while washing your hair. Also the Godrej hair dye (black) available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights.Cons:1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair. Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results. (note: if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more, I would suggest 3 sachets).2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair.3 Just like any other chemical hair color, it damages you hair and makes your hair rough.Verdict:It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color/highlight your hair at home. I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results.If you find my review helpful, please click the YES/HELPFUL button! 👍

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Best hair highlighter!  Loved it. Perfect for brown hair girls!  It stays for a long time. No damage, no dullness or frizzy hair.. The conditioner provided by streax is just awesome.. Makes your hair colour look more glossy and shiny. Smoothed out the hair..

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: I'm looking like tigress.  I love it.  😘😘

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: You don’t need to pay extra in salons when u have this. I just love this colour. But if you have long hair then you need two packets of this as such the quantity is less. Other than you can see everything in the picture. I just love the way it turned out.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Very nice product,,, easy too use with gud colout

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: This color is not for highlighting natural hair. It can highlight only bleached hair. And this kit does not contain blond powder to bleach the hair. It contains only developer and color. I applied it and it didn't give me any visible result on my natural hair, although it can be seen in sunlight. But I didn't get the color I desired.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Did It my on  ends, gives  beautiful  colour  used style 1 n 2 both 1  is brown ( lesser time)  to orangish  if  kept  fr  long and 2  is orange  to golden. U can experience storbing  at home  with  it at cheap  rate with great  results.. Use it  with Britt or simply  wherever u want  with gloved ✋  N it doesn't  damge  hair  just  takecare that  u oil  or  spa  it regularly as lighter hair  tends to look rough.  Go for it ,follow instructions given  for usage..change  ur look  in Mts.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Its a nightmare!!!!!!Trust me, I stuck to each and every direction written on the leaflet, and after almost 2 hours of blonder-shampoo-color-shampoo routine, my entire hair turned orange!!!! That too, not a funky orange. Just the badly-done-henna orange, if you know what I mean.I have tried blue and green and blonde hair color previously, semi+permanent and permanent, but never did I think that a safe color like cappucino brown will turn out to be such a disaster!!!!!!!!Had to order another color just to cover this mess up. Frantically searching for scarfs andhats right now.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Product is good , but the final color is not it must be , it is reddish color

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Overall Streax Ultralights Hair Color in Style 2 is an extremely affordable and easy to use at home, complete hair highlighting kit. On colored hair it adds a vibrant shade ranging from light brown to golden without causing any hair damage.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair.Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family.Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos.Coming to this product let me review as under:Pros:1  Gives good color/highlights if kept for about 45 minutes. (note: 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair).2 The color stays for about 8-9 months and lightens with time.3 After about 1-1.5 months of applying this hair color, I would suggest to use henna/mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs...which will not only nourish your hair, but also give very good result for highlighted hairs.4 Personal tip- If you are not satisfied with colored/highlighted hair and want to remove it, use anti-dandruff shampoo 3-4 times while washing your hair. Also the Godrej hair dye (black) available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights.Cons:1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair. Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results. (note: if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more, I would suggest 3 sachets).2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair.3 Just like any other chemical hair color, it damages you hair and makes your hair rough.Verdict:It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color/highlight your hair at home. I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results.If you find my review helpful, please click the YES/HELPFUL button! 👍

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Best hair highlighter!  Loved it. Perfect for brown hair girls!  It stays for a long time. No damage, no dullness or frizzy hair.. The conditioner provided by streax is just awesome.. Makes your hair colour look more glossy and shiny. Smoothed out the hair..

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: I'm looking like tigress.  I love it.  😘😘

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: You don’t need to pay extra in salons when u have this. I just love this colour. But if you have long hair then you need two packets of this as such the quantity is less. Other than you can see everything in the picture. I just love the way it turned out.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Very nice product,,, easy too use with gud colout

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: This color is not for highlighting natural hair. It can highlight only bleached hair. And this kit does not contain blond powder to bleach the hair. It contains only developer and color. I applied it and it didn't give me any visible result on my natural hair, although it can be seen in sunlight. But I didn't get the color I desired.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Did It my on  ends, gives  beautiful  colour  used style 1 n 2 both 1  is brown ( lesser time)  to orangish  if  kept  fr  long and 2  is orange  to golden. U can experience storbing  at home  with  it at cheap  rate with great  results.. Use it  with Britt or simply  wherever u want  with gloved ✋  N it doesn't  damge  hair  just  takecare that  u oil  or  spa  it regularly as lighter hair  tends to look rough.  Go for it ,follow instructions given  for usage..change  ur look  in Mts.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Its a nightmare!!!!!!Trust me, I stuck to each and every direction written on the leaflet, and after almost 2 hours of blonder-shampoo-color-shampoo routine, my entire hair turned orange!!!! That too, not a funky orange. Just the badly-done-henna orange, if you know what I mean.I have tried blue and green and blonde hair color previously, semi+permanent and permanent, but never did I think that a safe color like cappucino brown will turn out to be such a disaster!!!!!!!!Had to order another color just to cover this mess up. Frantically searching for scarfs andhats right now.

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Product is good , but the final color is not it must be , it is reddish color

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Gurl, don't buy this if you don't want to bleach your hair. My hair used to be a really dark brown, so it's black now. Not even a tint of purple. Hair dyes normally don't show up dark hair naturally. You either bleach your hair and lie it die or use a REALLY BRIGHT HAIR DYE AND PRAY FOR THE HAIR LORDS TO BLESS YOUR FACE.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Dont know for how long it will stay colour is nice only if used on properly bleached hair else won't be visible. Streax other items are not that highly priced its reasonable unlike this one. For this tubr 300 is fine.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Absolutely perfect product, delivers exactly as described. No flaws. Very pleasant smell and works like a wonder. Just follow instructions exactly. And do lighten hair with bleach.Advice- do wear gloves as volume will stain skin.Small criticism- bottle had little less product to colour all my hair as I have quite thick and long hair. But can easily get two bottles and it’s perfect

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: It's a very rich purple. More red hued but does it's work.Semi permanentI really disliked it's smell.Very strong!

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: I love the longetivity of this product , this is the only purple I could find out of every semi permanent dyes out there.This is my first time using this product and it turned out really pretty , but I had to bleach my hair twice and it is very important to bleach your hair to level 8 or above (total blonde) ..do not dilute the colour and always take 1:2 ratio of blonder and developer to get the best results

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: I've been trying to get purple hair since so long! Wanted to get rid of green hair without bleach washing and directly applied the purple dye over the green hair. I was really surprised when the colour turned out the way I wanted!Really great quality and quantity for 450 rs. Very happy with the purchase! The smell is a bit strong, but pleasant. More red undertones than blue.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Doesn't work without bleach ....why are u selling a colour without bleach then include it ...too much high price

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: The product colour doesn't stay for a long time.Need to apply every 2weeks once.Rather than that no other flaws. The colour is vibrant. Need to Bleach your hair before using it.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Nice purple. Doesn’t stay for too long. Pretty good. Colored extremely dark hair. Buy hair bleach and developer with it.

name: Streax-Soft-Hair-Colour-Natural-Black-170
review: I have never used any hair color before but for my white hairs my husband has recommended me streax hair color. its soft gel composition allow colour to spread easily. It is mild & gentle on the hair.now I say it is just awesome.After using this my hair has become very soft and color also looks very natural...

name: Streax-Soft-Hair-Colour-Natural-Black-170
review: Insufficient quantity of developer..... Neither do they replace it nor do they take any action.....I do not think anyone should buy it as there is no effect without this developer

name: Streax-Soft-Hair-Colour-Natural-Black-170
review: I liked this product a lot. Color comes out to be so natural looking. I told my friends too to use the same.

name: Streax-Soft-Hair-Colour-Natural-Black-170
review: Best quality done first time colour happy to use best streax..well it's rightly said color b care b.. amazing shiny hair

review: Perfect gel formula..No cream base like in all other colors for example garnier.. I m using it from 4 years.. Easily stays for 25 days..whether u use harsh shmpoo or mild..whether hot water ir cold..perfect color

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: The blue came out great! I have dark brown hair and bleached it twice (with volume 30 developer) before applying the colour. Left the colour on for 45-60 minutes. My hair (which felt very rough after bleaching) became much softer after rinsing off the colour. I also used the Crazy Violet (can see it in the pic). Have previously used Manic Panic hair colour which is 4 times the price, and a lot less effective. Would definitely recommend this range from Streax :D

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Very vibrant colour and fade away after a monthl , perfect electric blue 👌👌😎,but you have to bleach your hair twice before applying itIt works on atleast level 10 hair 😎

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: Came out a beautiful colour on my level 9 hair even though I diluted it with conditioner to increase the quantity. Would've been stunning if I didn't have to do that! Try to increase the time between washes as you can noticeably see it fade after every wash. Give your hair a blast of cold water after showering to lock the cuticle or the colour will bleed over your neck, clothes, everywhere until it dries.

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: It gives this color on lifting your black hair to level 5-6..I guess the streax gems collection is much better than this single tube color

name: Streax-Professional-Hold-Funkey-Colour
review: I have ordered 2 and i have only recipe 1

name: Himalaya-4004G-Baby-Powder-400g

name: Himalaya-4004G-Baby-Powder-400g

name: Himalaya-4004G-Baby-Powder-400g
review: Product:All the Himalaya baby products are good and at par with Johnson products with almost half the price. This baby powder is no exception. Although we are so used to that calming J&J baby smell that this smell doesn't seem like good enough. But overall the product does the job.Packaging:It need a little improvement because my package was crushed but the product was safe.Delivery:As always before. time.

name: Himalaya-4004G-Baby-Powder-400g

review: It contains ammonia guyz. It's very dangerous. I bought it and used it one day one the next day morning my face swelled. But my skin is smooth and its glowing but I had numerous side effects. They will sell their products but people health could completely damaged

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: Why free article not delivered/provided along product where it is clearly mentioned on bottle that  free body lotion 100ml and not for individual sale?

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: Product is just awesome..  If u have dry skin,  then this is the right one for u...  Mine is damn dry skin and it is working just awesome unlike other face wash..  Even Himalaya neem face is not that good like aloevera one...

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: This is superb! I love it from the day I started using it. It works like a charm. My skin is as soft as that of a new born baby and I receive loads of compliments day in and day out for this. Thank You so much, Himalaya Herbals. A big thanks to Amazon for the lovely packing and packaging of the product as well as timely delivery. If you found my review helpful, please click on helpful and let me know. Divine Thanks. BLESSED BE!!

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: I regularly buy products from Amazon.in, but this was for the 1st time I had to face disappointment. Upon opening the package I found that the Himalaya  moisturizing Aloe Vera face wash was missing by half.😱

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: Bought this product and delivered yesterday (6th Aug). Delivery and Packaging is superb as always.Regarding face wash: Suitable for dry face only. Therefore not recommended for other skin types. Kind of sticky and thus does not gives clean look.

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: Initially I thought this face wash is waste of money as it doesn't lather at all but used it for a month anyways. I have started noticing a lot of difference in my skin. This made my skin very soft n all the dry patches I had on my face have reduced as this doesn't dry your skin rather hydrate your skin along with cleaning it... Best face wash for people with sensitive n dry skin.

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: First impression : lathers very poorly. It's like applying lotion and washing it off. But well lack of foam doesn't necessarily mean it's not cleaning my skin.Second impression after washing : mmm skin does feel better,will try using it againFinal impression after using it some more : Very good 👍. It really does moisturize your skin. Perfect for dry skin, specially in harsh winter.I've very dry and sensitive skin so i need a very good moisturising  skin care routine specially in winter months. My sensitive skin does not agree with random products bought off the shelf. I tried this in 100ml tube as it's herbal and I liked as it really does moisturize my dry skin so I bought this 200ml pack from Amazon.I removed a star though as it's outlet is so big ,a very generous amount plops out in single pump and you end up finishing it up way faster as compared to other face wash( the 100ml tube had a very generous outlet too).

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: I loved this face wash, nice clean feel  post the use. I mostly used high end face products coz I have dry skin and what we usually get in the market is for oily skin but this is my new fav.  Well done Himalaya 👍🏼

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: A very good product for winters for extremely dry skin,smells gud,leaves your skin soft and supple n pea size product is enough and to be used on wet face gives a little lather,,,,,a very good facewash for this price,,,have been using from one month now.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I bought 100ml pack at local shop to try it and I loved the fragrance and it leaves my baby hair smooth with a lovely lingering smell. So I ordered a 400ml pack at Amazon @Rs.168.The one I bought at local store is very thick,with almost gel like consistency, doesn't even spill out even if the cap is open and lying down,have to really squeeze it out. But the one I bought from Amazon is so watery and runny. Spills out in an instant without even squeezing bottle.There is no seal on bottle so there's no telling if the content is genuine or tampered with,maybe diluted, who knows.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Hai guys...!👋The product arrived within one of ordering so Thumsup Amazon for that.🏆Positives-:👇✓Received a brand new product.(Mfg date-:03/18)✓Smells smooth and heavenly✓No skin irritation or any other allergic reactions.✓The strength of this shampoo was so mild.(The kid was not even crying during his bath)✓Cheaper than the local retail stores👉Thanks 4 reading..!👈

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I have been holding off on buying shampoo for my kids b/c even the "natural" shampoos have tons of chemicals and cause dandruff in their hair. This shampoo is wonderful - it's very gentle and smells good too!Their scalps were not irritated by it so it's good for sensitive skin.Very good product from amazon

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Being a mom I am very peculiar about the cosmetics I use for my baby and I always try to use non chemical based cosmetics for my baby.I have tried few so called big foreign brands before but results were below average and at last tried himalaya baby shampoo and the results were just astonishing.All thr natural oil of my babies hairs were abck to normal, hairs were were soft, hardly any itching in eyes.It's a must buy products for all thr moms who love their babies.5 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 product

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I used this for  my own hair  and its actually good for the times when u r having trouble with ur hair and nothingsuits ur hair is falling off soits better to use something as mild as the baby shampoo! This gives shine and makes ur hair soft but dont rely on this shampoo for removing oil from ur hair this is way mild for  that !

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I have curly hair and am recovering from heat damage hence went natural about 3 months ago. Needed CG friendly shampoo and this one does the job.The consistency is thick like any other shampoo and it is a clear liquid. Since it is a baby shampoo, if you are an adult you may require a good 10 ml shampoo for one time use.Given the price it is worth it.  Leaves hair and scalp feeling clean.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: There is nothing gentle about this shampoo. Himalaya does not disclose its entire ingredient list and contains methylchloroisothiazolinone which is proven to toxic. Why cheat consumers like this!

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: From Amazon they send my package very safely so it m happy with their services but this shampoo is not suitable for adults i ordered it for myself (btw i m 20) and u can't believe how horrible it's result is, actually i ordered it for decreasing my hair fall but using 1time my hair fall increase horribly and my hair became so sticky that i can't explain....i never use that shampoo after that it was just a waste of money

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Don't know if just our bottle was duplicate or not, as it was discounted and my son and daughter had instant hair loss. Threw it out and reverted to Johnson and the hair loss stopped after another 2 days. Will not use this again

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Great shampoo! Sulfate free, mild, soothing fragrance. Make sure you take a lot more than you usually do for it to feel sufficient. Also, rub your palms together to create a soft lather and then rub on to scalp/hair. This is important. Really useful to those with curly hair. Gentle enough for your little one.

review: Hai guys...!👋The product arrived within one of ordering so Thumsup Amazon for that.🏆Positives-:👇✓Received a brand new product.(Mfg date-:03/18)✓Smells smooth and heavenly✓No skin irritation or any other allergic reactions.✓The strength of this shampoo was so mild.(The kid was not even crying during his bath)✓Cheaper than the local retail stores👉Thanks 4 reading..!👈

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I have been holding off on buying shampoo for my kids b/c even the "natural" shampoos have tons of chemicals and cause dandruff in their hair. This shampoo is wonderful - it's very gentle and smells good too!Their scalps were not irritated by it so it's good for sensitive skin.Very good product from amazon

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Being a mom I am very peculiar about the cosmetics I use for my baby and I always try to use non chemical based cosmetics for my baby.I have tried few so called big foreign brands before but results were below average and at last tried himalaya baby shampoo and the results were just astonishing.All thr natural oil of my babies hairs were abck to normal, hairs were were soft, hardly any itching in eyes.It's a must buy products for all thr moms who love their babies.5 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 🌟 product

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I used this for  my own hair  and its actually good for the times when u r having trouble with ur hair and nothingsuits ur hair is falling off soits better to use something as mild as the baby shampoo! This gives shine and makes ur hair soft but dont rely on this shampoo for removing oil from ur hair this is way mild for  that !

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I have curly hair and am recovering from heat damage hence went natural about 3 months ago. Needed CG friendly shampoo and this one does the job.The consistency is thick like any other shampoo and it is a clear liquid. Since it is a baby shampoo, if you are an adult you may require a good 10 ml shampoo for one time use.Given the price it is worth it.  Leaves hair and scalp feeling clean.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: There is nothing gentle about this shampoo. Himalaya does not disclose its entire ingredient list and contains methylchloroisothiazolinone which is proven to toxic. Why cheat consumers like this!

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: From Amazon they send my package very safely so it m happy with their services but this shampoo is not suitable for adults i ordered it for myself (btw i m 20) and u can't believe how horrible it's result is, actually i ordered it for decreasing my hair fall but using 1time my hair fall increase horribly and my hair became so sticky that i can't explain....i never use that shampoo after that it was just a waste of money

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Don't know if just our bottle was duplicate or not, as it was discounted and my son and daughter had instant hair loss. Threw it out and reverted to Johnson and the hair loss stopped after another 2 days. Will not use this again

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: Great shampoo! Sulfate free, mild, soothing fragrance. Make sure you take a lot more than you usually do for it to feel sufficient. Also, rub your palms together to create a soft lather and then rub on to scalp/hair. This is important. Really useful to those with curly hair. Gentle enough for your little one.

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I bought 100ml pack at local shop to try it and I loved the fragrance and it leaves my baby hair smooth with a lovely lingering smell. So I ordered a 400ml pack at Amazon @Rs.168.The one I bought at local store is very thick,with almost gel like consistency, doesn't even spill out even if the cap is open and lying down,have to really squeeze it out. But the one I bought from Amazon is so watery and runny. Spills out in an instant without even squeezing bottle.There is no seal on bottle so there's no telling if the content is genuine or tampered with,maybe diluted, who knows.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Very Nice Product . It is very light weighted and quickly gets absorbed so that you don't feel  creamy when you get out using this. It gives a smooth feeling to our skin and will not irritated your skin at all. This product is a lotion and not a moisturizer so it is not a replaced for that this is baby lotion too. It works very well for your skin.As this is not an oily lotion which will not make you sweat even in hot summer It  smells  good and leaves skin smooth afterwards.  Even though this is a baby lotion people with very sensitive skin can also use this one as it is good for damaged skin too. After using for many months i can say it rebuilds your skin.Himalaya is now not using Paraben for Baby lotion so the lotion is safe than before. This lotion is not greesy at all. Please go for Original product as duplicates are out there.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: I bought this for myself because it came up under a search for vegan lotion. However, I will continue buying it because it is so lightweight and quickly absorbed. I live in the desert and am impressed by how much it hydrates my skin.Thank you Amazon

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: This is one of the best baby lotion in Market. I got this at Rs.67 only. As it is from Himalaya, I need not to write anything about quality as Himalaya products are always best in class.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Best product for kids

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: I've ordered it 3 times and likely to order again. Unlike the 400ml Himalaya gentle baby shampoo or gentle baby bath which has no seals, this lotion comes in clear laminated sealed pack and I've received it in good condition and packing all the 3 times I ordered. Although it's tad light it's okay for baby skin. I love it's fragrance, leaves my baby smelling nice and I use it myself too but it's too light for my dry skin,but of course it's meant mainly for babies.One winning feature about this particular 400ml pack is it's pump feature,makes it lot easier to literally use it singlehandedly which comes in real handy if you've to hold a squirming wriggling baby with your other hand!Update : I've ordered my 9th bottle! Initially seller give one bottle but nowadays the minimum quantity is 2 bottles. But it's okay,your baby is going to use it every day and they come with very good shelf life so you finish them long before it's expiry date.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Damn..my bad..i ordered this product without reading all the reviews..me too got damaged watery bad lotion..now im not sure whether to use it or throw it away..bad lotion smells bad looks messy and leaked all over the package..trying to return it but it says THIS ITEM IS NOT ELIGIBLE FOR RETURN..Seriously amazon sucks these days..TOO BAD WORST WORST WORST PRODUCT...p.s i dont want to give any star but its asking me to do it so i can stop others from buying this waste trash.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Recieved broken bottle cap. Bad packaging from seller (plz check image attached. This is how I got it..)Himalaya products are no doubt good with  nice mild fragrance. I prefer himalaya over any other brands specially for my baby. Baby wash from himalaya I myself have tried for washing my face n it actually is no tear baby wash unlike other who claim to be no tear but are irritant to eyes.

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Himalaya babycare baby lotion is specially formulated to restore the skin’s natural beauty , Great product enriched with almond oil that restore skin’s moisture, olive oil which improves skin luster, and yashtimadhu and country mallow, which soothes the skin. It contains 100% herbal actives so perfect for baby's skin. Highly recommend it.

review: Totally satisfied with the product.Value for money.Manufacturing date was of August and I ordered in October and I got the fresh product.. totally satisfied..

review: I ordered it for a friend, and after she opened it, she really loved it. Great package, every item is as it was descripted on amazon site.

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack

In this product we r almost getting everything n it can be gifted,overall it is very good one & I am happy with that.loved it! 😘

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: Satisfied,Value for 💰Get in Sale ₹570=9itemsIn good condition(Mf Date-06/2019)U can gift  for a baby..

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: So lets get started .. first of all lests talk about the pros1. Convenient2. All in one3. Having all necessary things4. Good packaging and good handling5. Awesome presentation and good qualitySo there are so many pros but wait it doesn't have so much cons because it is souch worthy to spend if you don't have time to waste in any of the single product to buy thats one for you and also its a good option for giftingIf you find it helpful please click on helpful

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: The product was delivered with a broken basket and the powder had opened up and spilled over every other item.Since this is a non returnable item, please let me know what can be done.It's a very disappointing experience

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: All items in the box contains dust. Soap wrappers teared. Basket has manufacturing defect and item was damaged during the transportation.

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: I bought pack of 9 along with the basket and it costed me 735rs ..even after calculating mrp of individual product total cost is around 1025rs. So overall its an impressive deal . Rest i will use himalaya product for the first time. Johnson has lost its credibilty so i thought of giving it a try.

name: Himalaya-Gift-Pack
review: Its not really very durable, the products are good. And it is value for money. Got the basket which was broken, i made a complain and since this was a non-returnable product they refunded the money as amazon pay to me and gave me the products too. Time was wasted but they solved my problem so its okay.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Happy with this product in the winter time also it gives best result for my son and yes I do malish before the bath or in night day before bath with pure cow ghee along with termaric powder and after bath I gently use this lotion. I am using both lotion and powder for him from very starting . I ordered two one for my son and another for my cousin's child.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Although it doesn't make your skin super soft or anything, it does a pretty good job.It gets absorbed into your skin pretty quickly with minimal effort.It also forms a protective layer until your next shower.And I like how it's free from parabens and mineral oil.An ideal light weight moisturizer for non-winter months.The smell reminds me a bit of guava.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: For Kids -3

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Recived the product on time thanks Amazon 😘 😘Abt the product =I have been using the product a long.. It is good and come in sealed plactoc packing it has Pleasant fragrance, Thick to Medium Consistency, light on application, Easy to use bottles with nozzle / Pump.Overall m happy the usage😘😘Shall be recommended 👍👍P.s pic in the attachment

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: About that Himalaya cream, I would like to share that this product is not recent manufacturing , it is one year back manufacturing but other items are June 2019 manufacturing.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: I switched over from Johnson and Johnson for my son, never had any issues with Himalaya brand, be it there soap, powder or shampoo, looks like they are safe for kids.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Won’t suggest it to people having very dry skin like mine.Good for normal to oily skin. Gets absorbed instantly.My skin needs something greasy as it’s very dry.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Another amazing product from Himalaya nonsticky with lovely fragrance ... I m using it from long n  happy with it

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: The product is definitely paraben and sulphate free. However people who have very dry skin would need to apply it multiple times. Price is also quite competitive.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: Using it from 2016 for my daughter..Her day starts with this lotion and before going to sleep she herself asks for lotion...

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: i bought this cream for my mom and ladies believe me its work great more then fancy costly  creams but yes its oily but thts ok bcs of result....i wish a serum in same series...thanx amazon ad himalaya..pls like yes if u love my review bcs its free for u.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I was using Himalaya moisturized 8 years back and my skin was really good, soft and gentle. After I moved to Hyderabad I moved to different products like Olay, Ponds, Lotus, Maybelline, Lakme etc. I wasn't happy with any of them. but this Anti aging cream is awesome, in a weeks time I can see and feel the difference in my skin, its very light and light smell. Totally like this cream.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I have ordered this product for my Mom. And she is very happy with the results after using this product.It does works nicely to reduce your wrinkles if you will apply it on daily bases.At least use this twice in a day, if you really want to improve your skin tone.What I liked the most about this product:#####################################👌Its fragrance is good.👌Made up with natural ingredients, So it won't harm to your skin.👌Comes with a very cheaper price if we will  compare to other related brands.👌JUST go for this product if you are suffering from wrinkle problem.####################################GO for it.Its a value for money product under budget.🤗

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I got this for my mom because of the reviews and, to be honest, because of its low price. My mom has been applying it with great dedication every night for over 2 months now (had it ordered 2 times). I can’t say I have seen much of a difference. The least a cream can do is moisturize, but this cream doesn’t work as a moisturizer either. Again, I might be wrong and because my mom has just started using aging creams while she should have started at least some 10 years ago. But, I would really recommend going with better options. And people in the same predicament as mine, can you please suggest me creams that might work?

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: So nice product, my skin is combination type (oily n dry), it works magically especially in winter. Gives u Extra softness..

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: My mom changed from ponds day n night cream  after ages and the result is so good.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I was bit skeptical about this cream as I was not sure this is good for my age group or not. After using this for about a week I can say that this one is great cream for anyone who is 25+. It's very moisturising so if you have oily skin like I do, little is more. I love to mix it with few drops of rose water n massage my face for a min or so.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I would like to give five stars. Really amazing work on wrinkles. I am using my third bottle. But apply it on wrinkles before going to sleep. Apply little thicker. You can see the amazing results. Those who are worried about their wrinkles go for it. I got it for 165rs.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: This product gives burning sensation, forget removal of wrinkles and ageing signs. I even got red pathes and rashes on face after 3 days of use. M a huge Himalaya fan, but this product is a big NO!!

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I love it! Light texture, light scent, excellent results. Keeps you looking youthful, of course won't do miracles, but will slow aging process and I feel it removed expression lines that were starting to show. I've been using it for quite a while, almost a year, and it's the best product I've tried of its kind. I can use makeup straight on top of it and it's fine.

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: i bought this cream for my mom and ladies believe me its work great more then fancy costly  creams but yes its oily but thts ok bcs of result....i wish a serum in same series...thanx amazon ad himalaya..pls like yes if u love my review bcs its free for u.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: Of all teas which i have tested and tasted, this tea has been my companion since many decades...  with little bit of adrak, pudina leaves, and one little pinch of the powder of cardamon & sticks - but you add milk separately heating it. And see the difference...It is heavenly after a tiring day ... though am not addicted to tea... but have found this particular tea very much enjoyable... and light :-)Thanks .

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: I tried many other tea brands over the years, however, I have to wait for those tea to finish to get back to getting this Tea. There is no match for this tea. I've been using this since childhood.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: Tasted Society Tea Regular Tea first time at my friends's home in Mumbai and found it very good. could not find it locally and hence as soon as I found it on Amazon, placed the maximum no.pouches allowed to an individual buyer.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: One of the best tea I've ever tasted , my family in Mumbai has been using this for ages..Best thing is if Milk is hot then it will take only 2 mins to prepare....The colour, taste and aroma is just mesmerizing..

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: Taste is a matter of preference. Personally speaking, quite liked the taste and flavour of the brand

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch
review: Have been using society since many yearsAlways the same taste and flavour

review: It is good for tea lovers who like their tea strong and straight.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-250g-Pouch

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Earlier" society "tea powder is Good in quality and flavour but after "society "comes in society its quality degraded and amlagmation of dust in "chaipatti " dettered its qiality.we hope for best from "society "to best for society

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: I'm a milk-tea addicted person. Although, I control it upto thrice day but sometimes it may exceed 5.Since I like milk-tea alot, I have tried many Dust-teas available in the market.I've tried and tasted Wagh-bakri, brookebond, Taj, society, maharsthra chai, maa-beti Chai & you name it.I liked the society tea alot. This tea when boiled in the water gives a nice flavor and the color which no other teas can give.The packaging was nice. I ordered for a 1kg pack directly since I already knew about the taste.From the value for money standpoint, it is a little costlier (20-30 Rs per kg)  in comparison to its other teas of its class. But you will find it worth it. Just make sure you use a correct method to prepare to get the best out of it.Method in the sense, first boil it in water and then add milk.Directly adding into milk will also give you the good taste but the colour will fade away in that case.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Received this product in damaged condition and it doesn’t come under returnable category. Since the seal is broken can’t use the product

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: We are A family of tea drinkers and found it to be the best ever had.Been faithful to Tata tea gold since it got launched but had to buy society tea when our brand was not available during lockdown and found it to be better than Tata tea gold.Where Tata tea gold has longer leaf this one looks like any other tea but once the tea is brewed the colour and taste was as strong as Tata tea gold. Not a percent less.Price was also similar to Tata tea gold. Henceforth we are going to buy whichever brand is on discount online.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Tea above rs. 400 per kg should not contain dust..At the rate 400/-, why to add dust with ctc granules.. Its a 100% margin business, still the company providing sub standard ctc instead of bopsm.. I will not going yo buy it again

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Society tea by far is the best brand in terms of taste, colour and flavour. I'm using this brand of tea since ages, maybe more than 15 years. Infact I dont buy any other tea except Society. But this time Im not satisfied with my buy as no discounts were offered.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Product is fine. Package had a hole in it & tea powder leaked out.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: Society Masala Tea is far better than this one. Pack within expiry but due to storage conditions discolored.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: I am using this tea for last 7 year.  Getting this product in bangalore is not easy. Sometime it will be avaialble. Happy to get this product through Amazon.Tea flavour is too good.  After having Society tea, we are not fine in having any other tea :)To get the proper flavour, boil it in water well then add milk.  Sometime i use this tea decoction for hair conditioning also. So pure.

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: It’s perfect and this 500 gm mini pouch i purchased to gift a friend of mine😍I had ordered one kg jar in jan and second one has just arrived yesterday...do i need to say more???Perfect taste of Chai ...!

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: It’s perfect and this 500 gm mini pouch i purchased to gift a friend of mine😍I had ordered one kg jar in jan and second one has just arrived yesterday...do i need to say more???Perfect taste of Chai ...!

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Recently, I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time.  I simply loved it, more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon, cardamom, ginger etc. written on the box.  I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients.  The box says there are added 'flovors' only.  How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different.  I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately, Amazon does not accept return of food items.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Excellent product as its smell,taste and flavour... Every customer who have idea about tea take it without dought ...drink with milk or without milk. Thank you my Amazon and thank you seller... I am very satisfied.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Very good one. Tastes awesome. But the product has come in a plastic water bottle which is free. The plastic is very cheap and the smell of plastic is there in the tea also. Had to empty the contents to a better container. Earlier the container the tea came was very good. This time they have changed it to a water bottle.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: The tea is good. But old stock. Packed on October 2016. Best before 12 months of packing. So it's already outdated when received.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: The tea is great but the delivery charges ruins the whole taste and it feels iy aint orth it. 130 is MRP & 120 is Delivery charges which make it double the price, thus not worth it.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: This masla tea is best in taste and aroma.I purchased four  different  companies  masala tea to compare the taste .l found test of Society masala  over and above three companies  masala tea.Further a small quantity  of  tea leaves  require to prepare  aromic tasty tea.I am continuously  purchasing this tea now.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: When I made my first brew I got impressed by the smell only. The smell was really nice and above all masala was thoroughly mixed within the tea leaves which release it's taste and aroma when water boils. Delivery was fine and instead of box I got a very beautiful sipper which made my day.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: The which has been sent looks like it's a fake product as there are lumps in it ... plus there a foul smell coming out of it please take it back and refund my money

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Good but very spicy. Young people will like it but for old/children it is very strong.If mixed with normal tea then better.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Good for the first time use. Later you get irritated due to the spices. May be they should have added more cardamom

review: This masla tea is best in taste and aroma.I purchased four  different  companies  masala tea to compare the taste .l found test of Society masala  over and above three companies  masala tea.Further a small quantity  of  tea leaves  require to prepare  aromic tasty tea.I am continuously  purchasing this tea now.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: When I made my first brew I got impressed by the smell only. The smell was really nice and above all masala was thoroughly mixed within the tea leaves which release it's taste and aroma when water boils. Delivery was fine and instead of box I got a very beautiful sipper which made my day.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: The which has been sent looks like it's a fake product as there are lumps in it ... plus there a foul smell coming out of it please take it back and refund my money

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Good but very spicy. Young people will like it but for old/children it is very strong.If mixed with normal tea then better.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Good for the first time use. Later you get irritated due to the spices. May be they should have added more cardamom

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Recently, I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time.  I simply loved it, more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon, cardamom, ginger etc. written on the box.  I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients.  The box says there are added 'flovors' only.  How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different.  I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately, Amazon does not accept return of food items.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Excellent product as its smell,taste and flavour... Every customer who have idea about tea take it without dought ...drink with milk or without milk. Thank you my Amazon and thank you seller... I am very satisfied.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Very good one. Tastes awesome. But the product has come in a plastic water bottle which is free. The plastic is very cheap and the smell of plastic is there in the tea also. Had to empty the contents to a better container. Earlier the container the tea came was very good. This time they have changed it to a water bottle.

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: When you need just one cup of tea and are too lazy to go through the whole rigmarole, this product is a lifesaver!Just heat water (optionally, add some milk for a richer taste) in a cup in the microwave, then drop in a heaped scoop of this premix. Voila, your tea is ready - no utensils to wash, no gas needed, no tea leaves to throw and no tea filter to clean.Decent in taste, full marks for convenience, this is a must-have in my kitchen.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: There are ten sachets in the pack along with measuring cup for 100ml water. You can make one cup tea per sachet. Taste is individual's preference. But I found tea made from Girnar's sachets more tasty.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: This is perfect for travellers and lazy people only thing u need to do is take hot water mix powder and awesome masala tea is ready(make sure u follow instructions and mix it in right proportion as instructed).It's a must if u are travelling and u can't live without good tea.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: I didn't like the taste of it. Too sweet and while I do like sweets, not in my tea. I bought it because I couldn't get my regular one and that this was from Society, and yet I discarded it after just trying it once. So you can imagine how much I hated it. But to each his own. You might like it, who knows. As for me I am never ordering it again.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: Nothing special.  Need to mix in a lot of the powder to get a decent tasting cup of tea.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: This instant tea is really good. The only thing you need to do is add 1 tsp of milk powder to 1 scoop of tea along with 100 ml hot water. Tastes great and is super refreshing! A must buy!

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: My favorite premixed Masala Tea... I only wish the policy of limited quantities of this product per customer is removed.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: Tried many premixed massala tea earlier.. didn't like them.. This time orded it with doubts.. but really amazed with the product..  It's really my choice of massala tea...

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: We are regularly using this tea..Best option for early morning busy routines..Just pour hot or warm water and your tea is ready..Purchased several times now..

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Masala-500g
review: Best instant teaoutstanding taste masala tea😋

review: The flavour and aroma are amazing but simply mixing water gives a very thin consistency. I mix a spoon of milk powder to get the thickness of milk so that it feels like real tea. It's also cheaper, even for a wholesale pack, compared to other companies.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: The original society tea the blue packet is better than this. It has one salty taste that make the tea horrible. No premium quality. Price has increased with deteriorated quality

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: The tea is really good. Tastes better than wagh bakri premium tea but grain size is much smaller.Leaves a lot of dust at the bottom of the container which is a bit annoying. Every time you finish the container, a lot of tea will be wasted in the form of dust.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: We are drinking this tea since years when we are in Mumbai.Only recently started to purchase it on amazon as it is'nt available in any stores across Hyderabad.But in few packets the tea is very tiny n does not taste as strong as it should be.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: As the pricing was highest for this product in the company range assumed that it would be the best color and flavor.However was disspointed as the flavor is similar to the cheaper leaf tea or even some good dust variety. Also the tea leaves had some foul chemical odour coming, usually teas leaves give a fine frangance.This was prepared with full milk and not black. Not buying this again for sure.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Great taste. Bought it for my parents as they prefer mild teas and it is great for both mild and strong teas. We add a bit more leaves to make it strong. Most teas in Kerala have a flowery taste and they are not good for masala chai. This purchase solved that issue. It's great as a black tea as well. Just don't boil it while making black tea. Boil the leaves only for masala chai.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Good strong flavour, low price. But falsely advertised as "premium Leaf". It is very granular, almost like coffee grounds.Grains smaller than standard CTC, something like Dust Tea.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Very good taste. Feel the rich aroma. Very refreshing. After tasting several brands, found this tea with the premium flavor I was looking for. I will buy only this Society Premium tea moving forward.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: The flavous is awesome and packs a punch. It's on the stronger side of the spectrum so those who prefer a lighter flavour should look for something else. The delivery was fast and reacher here a good condition.

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Excellent tea very very strong tea previous i used taj mahal tea that's a very very worst product love you society Premium tea

name: Society-Tea-Premium-Packet-1000g
review: Strong tea. I prefer it this way.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Ginger-Lemongrass
review: I'm a new mom and trust me every second is important to me. Society one minute tea saves a lot of my time. I don't have to wait for tea to boil or anything. Just a cup of hot water and a tea bag is all I need.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Ginger-Lemongrass
review: Excellent dilute out of premix tried till time. Good test perfect no difference found compare to daily tea prepared with tea milk sugar and masala

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Ginger-Lemongrass
review: This one-minute tea is perfect for all hardcore tea lovers. It may not be as good as a thorough-boiled tea in your house but it is way, way better than those futile tea bags that add no taste to the hot water. Perfect for office use or while you travel, it shall surely make you feel home, wherever you are. :)

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Ginger-Lemongrass
review: I love the taste of this flavour.. Easy to make, hope they bring larger packs with 100 sachets or something.

name: Society-Tea-Minute-Ginger-Lemongrass
review: We were disappointed in the quality of the product. Society is known for strong tea. However, after having the Girnar premix teas, this one was mild and had very little flavour or smell of cardamom.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: It is strong and tastes very good. After trying almost 10 different brands of tea, I have found the one I like. I have tried Taj Mahal, Red label, RCM and many different others.I like my tea strong and for that you don't have to add too much of this tea. It is not just too strong tea, it tastes good. Most in my family like it and this is the one we are going to use from now on along with Red Label for those who like Red Label more.And Amazon, from time to time, provides good discounts on products and makes them affordable for all. Btw, it sells for 355 next door mall when Amazon is selling it for 385. I know shipping costs, so it is ok.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: We in our family have switched from Red Label to Tata Tea Gold now.Red Label is not bad, its just this one is better.This tea is perfect blend of aroma, taste and strong nature of tea. This is perfectly balanced tea between taste and kadak chai.Wagh bakri Tea is too strong with awful taste and Red Label is not so strong but taste good.This one got balanced both of it. So a must buy.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Received d product safe n intact But first time I received the very OLD dated products tea powder 7.5 month older and Ketchup is also 7.5 month older...:(Ketchup is to be used within 1.5 month... that to 1kg I have ordered.. :(sir, before this order I purchased Tata Tea Powder two months ago that product was received with Mfg. date 03/2017...!!! but now I received 2016 Mfg productsLoosing faith on Grocery Order...:(

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: The quality of the item is not up to the mark. The flavor and the strong test that we (me & my family) found in local shops of ₹10 pack of this tea is missing here.This item is fully useless in case of making liquor tea(red tea). If less liquor is given the tea seems nothing but boiled water & if given more the tea becomes black. I got stuck with this 500gm tea.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I have been using this product for more than three years but I always purchased 500 gm and 250 gm pack but this is the first time that I have purchased 1 kg pack with the expectation that the quality would be same but alas! this 1 kg pack has too much dust tea and very less leaf tea compared to 500 gm or 250 gm pack.Regarding price it is competitive than market price and regarding delivery I would give amazon one star.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Got it on deal arnd @190 rs.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky: everyone has their own preferences. Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea.For the purpose of making milk tea,  this particular brand is quite good: a strong combination of good colour, definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that's firm but not too overpowering.This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri. This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider.If you're the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you're looking for.It's price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many. That said,  if you enjoy that one good cup a day,  it's a worthy buy-in.My recommendation: certainly worth a try especially if you like a good,  developed flavour in your cuppa.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Its hard to believe how much they have gone down on the quality aspect compared to what it was 5 years back.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: see the product is genuine with latest mfgIt was well packed toothe only griviance is that even after being a prime member I receive the product after a week hope amazon consider that for next time

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: It is strong and tastes very good. After trying almost 10 different brands of tea, I have found the one I like. I have tried Taj Mahal, Red label, RCM and many different others.I like my tea strong and for that you don't have to add too much of this tea. It is not just too strong tea, it tastes good. Most in my family like it and this is the one we are going to use from now on along with Red Label for those who like Red Label more.And Amazon, from time to time, provides good discounts on products and makes them affordable for all. Btw, it sells for 355 next door mall when Amazon is selling it for 385. I know shipping costs, so it is ok.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: We in our family have switched from Red Label to Tata Tea Gold now.Red Label is not bad, its just this one is better.This tea is perfect blend of aroma, taste and strong nature of tea. This is perfectly balanced tea between taste and kadak chai.Wagh bakri Tea is too strong with awful taste and Red Label is not so strong but taste good.This one got balanced both of it. So a must buy.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Received d product safe n intact But first time I received the very OLD dated products tea powder 7.5 month older and Ketchup is also 7.5 month older...:(Ketchup is to be used within 1.5 month... that to 1kg I have ordered.. :(sir, before this order I purchased Tata Tea Powder two months ago that product was received with Mfg. date 03/2017...!!! but now I received 2016 Mfg productsLoosing faith on Grocery Order...:(

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: The quality of the item is not up to the mark. The flavor and the strong test that we (me & my family) found in local shops of ₹10 pack of this tea is missing here.This item is fully useless in case of making liquor tea(red tea). If less liquor is given the tea seems nothing but boiled water & if given more the tea becomes black. I got stuck with this 500gm tea.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I have been using this product for more than three years but I always purchased 500 gm and 250 gm pack but this is the first time that I have purchased 1 kg pack with the expectation that the quality would be same but alas! this 1 kg pack has too much dust tea and very less leaf tea compared to 500 gm or 250 gm pack.Regarding price it is competitive than market price and regarding delivery I would give amazon one star.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Got it on deal arnd @190 rs.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky: everyone has their own preferences. Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea.For the purpose of making milk tea,  this particular brand is quite good: a strong combination of good colour, definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that's firm but not too overpowering.This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri. This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider.If you're the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you're looking for.It's price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many. That said,  if you enjoy that one good cup a day,  it's a worthy buy-in.My recommendation: certainly worth a try especially if you like a good,  developed flavour in your cuppa.
