name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: This tata tea gold is a real gem in the house from tata. In my house we are using this tea since many long long years. And everyone like it. So fellows go for it blindly give it a try and i am really sure with this decision you wont regret it.Ps :  if you guys like very strong tea then go for tata premium this one is little mild, use elaichi, ginger and honey mix it well it adds up the flavour to your tea. I hope this review help you to choose right tea for yourself.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Quality as expected. Most of the people already have used this product. A very good taste. Using for years and no complaints from this product. Also got 15-20% discount on the price. So satisfied.If you liked my review please hit 'helpful' to motivate me to write loyal reviews.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Bought it  for Rs.182 instead of rs.216. all of you know the quality of tata tea very well. If you don't then try this product and you qon

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I was using Red label since ages and some time back switched to Tata Gold tea for some reason.I must say Tata gold is way cheaper and tests much batter than Red Label.Also quantity required to make a cup of tea is lesser compared to Red Label.These are my reasons to switch to Tata Gold:  1. Because of the controversial advertising by Red Label where they said that people go to Kumbh Mela to abandon  their old age parents. Thse MNCs come to India, make money from us and than mock us, this should not be tolerated.  2. To support Indian Brands like Tata, Patanjali, Dabur, etc.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: One of the best tea from the house of Tata and it is is a beautiful tea having good taste and flavour... actually it is an appropriate mixture of CTC and leaf tea..I ordered this product from Amazon and it was delivered on the next day in a very good packaging... I got it at discounted price...I got the product at 15% discounted price, as I bought the product during Super Value Days.The manufacturing date of product was just 2 and half months ago from date when I received the product in hand. Hence it is recently manufactured product. Also the product have a very good shelf life.Amazon delivered the product in very good condition and packaging of the product was just awesome. No damage. Amazing...The Amazon pantry box are very hard and during packaging they insert air filled sealed packets, so that the items don't move and pressure is absorbed by the air filled packets.Delivery of my order was just the next day morning. The delivery man took the package inside of my house, as it was heavy and kept the pantry box over a table, as I told him. I behavior of the delivery man was good.I am highly satisfied with the product and I recommend you to buy the product without any fear and hesitation. Believe me you will be satisfied after receiving the product and using it.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: This tea surprisingly has no taste and flavour, aroma at all. Total waste of money. With 2 spoons for a cup of tea there is no taste at all it feels like we are having just hot water with sugar. It needs 3 spoons for a cup, to atleast get slight taste of tea. I took 500gm pack now it's getting difficult to even finish the pack and start with some new tea. I took this tea because my regular brand Wagh Bakri was not available. Such tasteless tea is really not expected from brand Tata.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Looks Like Duplicate, When buy from Near by Grocery Shop, the taste is different.Delivered in Amazon pantry packets taste is very inferior, no aroma and color.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Nothing like Gold. It tastes really unexpected, not worth the price. Don't know what is the hype about.I purchased this Tea pack with GREAT EXPECTATIONS but was disappointed because even when I added two full spoons of tea leaves didn't really got that aroma and taste and not even color.Assuming by the reviews I am reading, It could be a fake product that I received.Will surely try to purchase again and give my valuable feedback.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I think it's one of the best available tea in this segment in the market... After all its a TATA product... It has long leaves...Please note that you have to use more quantity as compared to regular tea... I recommend making tea in a closed container on slow/low flame for best results...

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: This tata tea gold is a real gem in the house from tata. In my house we are using this tea since many long long years. And everyone like it. So fellows go for it blindly give it a try and i am really sure with this decision you wont regret it.Ps :  if you guys like very strong tea then go for tata premium this one is little mild, use elaichi, ginger and honey mix it well it adds up the flavour to your tea. I hope this review help you to choose right tea for yourself.

review: Quality is just ok, don't expect Tata tea gold,and tajmahal type taste and quality,It's average dust tea with average taste and aroma

name: Tata-Tea-Premium-North-1kg
review: I like this tea. But sir you have charged Rs 400 but it is avilable in market  for Rs 320  or  325. Please give me the required refund.  I shall be thankful to you.

name: Tata-Tea-Premium-North-1kg
review: Goodness- Great taste like we buy from market, good quality, fresh material, good packing.Bad point- not noticed , so I rated 5 starOverall Remark- purchase without doubt if you like to use it seeing price on Amazon as well as market price.

name: Tata-Tea-Premium-North-1kg
review: Regular consumer of this brand of tea, this time bought from Amazon pantry.🔹The tea leaves are finely coarsed🔹The colour is great even with a little amount of tea leaves ☕🔹Flavour and aroma is perfect🔹Manufacturing date is recent and since it comes in a zip lock bag, it's easy to keep freshness intact.Liked it !

name: Tata-Tea-Premium-North-1kg
review: No comments when it's a Tata product. Best amongst the best only. But what about Amazon service. When the MRP is 365 then why u ppl charged me 400.the only complaint.

review: Believe me it’s not good at all..Name is given as premium but literally there’s nothing like premium, after putting six to seven spoons still not good at taste so plzzz aware of that don’t go on name...

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: If you really a teas fan, you definitely not being unaware of the TATA Tea family. Trusted brand from so many years. I tried almost every standard brand of Teas available in the market, but at last I can say that TATA Tea is the best available brand in the printed price. Although TATA Tea brand is already quite efficient in serving the purpose but the current addition of 'TATA Tea Gold' actually makes sense because of the quality enhancement by adding dried whole tea leaves in to the processed tea. Mixing of whole leaf resulted into the enhanced flavor & color of the prepared Tea. Not more concentrated not milder, it’s like a balanced golden color with real taste/flavor which designed exactly keeping in mind the expectation of the user.1. I agree that if you require strong color/flavor you need to add a little more leaves in to the preparation because TATA Tea Gold is not meant for people who like very strong color seekers. Its more workable for people who wants real flavor with natural golden color in the final preparation. Although even a single tea-spoon is enough to prepare a natural golden cup full of real tea.2. One may keep in mind before using that this tea contains real whole dry tea leaves, so it may take more 2 minutes in preparation in comparison with other brands and the reason is, it is without any added artificial colors into it. The whole dried tea leaves takes time to release real flavor of the contents.3. Taste is premium & up to the expectations as always.4. Packaging is good enough. Visual ergonomic principles well taken into consideration designing the same. Its smarter and visually appealing than the previous packs.I’m using this product from more than 2 years. So, its not an random review. In my family we are using this product in making of every single cup day and night 24x7, whenver we feel like to have one.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: I prefer Tata tea to Brooke Bond/Taj Mahal.# Mild taste and fresh aroma# Gives me a soothing effect and relishes# Only small quantity sufficient for making tea# Does not play around with the basic tea taste# Can be consumed with milk or without itThe only issue is with the packaging, I would have preferred plastic box packaging for the price.That would actually help in preserving the aroma and prevent moisture.But, it's one of the best tea for everyday use.Cheers :)

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: Flavour of this tea is goodIt includes little leafs you can see them in itMust try tea

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: For those who love tea this is a great blend.1. It is a mix of  assam tea and leaf tea - gets you the best of both.2. To enjoy the blend and the tea it should be put in boiling water ( do not boil it post putting tea)3. Let it simmer for some time  3-5 min , and add sugar and milk separately .4. It works out great for the tea lovers and offers a consistent blend all the time.Once you start liking this tea - you will get hooked to it....

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: I love Tea...  Tata gold tea is one of the best product of Tata...  This it is very useful for daily use...I got this product from Amazon and got a recently manufactured product... The product is a genuine product...There are other variety of Tea available in the market but among those Tata gold tea is is the best tea according to me for daily use...I got the product at 15% discounted price, as I bought the product during Super Value Days.The manufacturing date of product was just 2 and half months ago from date when I received the product in hand. Hence it is recently manufactured product. Also the product have a very good shelf life.Amazon delivered the product in very good condition and packaging of the product was just awesome. No damage. Amazing...The Amazon pantry box are very hard and during packaging they insert air filled sealed packets, so that the items don't move and pressure is absorbed by the air filled packets.Delivery of my order was just the next day morning. The delivery man took the package inside of my house, as it was heavy and kept the pantry box over a table, as I told him. I behavior of the delivery man was good.I am highly satisfied with the product and I recommend you to buy the product without any fear and hesitation. Believe me you will be satisfied after receiving the product and using it.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: After using Taj Mahal tea for 20 years, now since the quality of Taj Mahal tea has gone down tremendously, and we have gas and stomach problems after consuming taj mahal tea, we wanted to shift for a better tea. After finding out a lot about different brands, I can assure you This is best tea in India. Always buy this.The taste is awesome, the only drawback is you have to put a lot of tea if you're used to drinking strong tea. Otherwise this is awesome.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: Once you see the packing and presentation of the package, one gets positive vibes and expects a lot more than regular tea. ALAS! It is much the same as Agni. Nothing more. Have to use good quantity to prepare good tea.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: I am using Tata tea Premium regulary, but bought Tata tea gold just to give it a try to see if it's more strong in flavour/aroma or tastes something different. However could not feel much difference rather it is more or less same like Premium tea infact Premium is better..

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: I have been taking Tata Gold tea since over two decades now. I have tried many cheap and expensive products but Tata Gold is non-replaceable. The new golden color packing is attractive.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: This is best quality tea for daily use at cheap rate. Very fast,next day delivery by Amazon pantry.

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-1kg
review: If you really a teas fan, you definitely not being unaware of the TATA Tea family. Trusted brand from so many years. I tried almost every standard brand of Teas available in the market, but at last I can say that TATA Tea is the best available brand in the printed price. Although TATA Tea brand is already quite efficient in serving the purpose but the current addition of 'TATA Tea Gold' actually makes sense because of the quality enhancement by adding dried whole tea leaves in to the processed tea. Mixing of whole leaf resulted into the enhanced flavor & color of the prepared Tea. Not more concentrated not milder, it’s like a balanced golden color with real taste/flavor which designed exactly keeping in mind the expectation of the user.1. I agree that if you require strong color/flavor you need to add a little more leaves in to the preparation because TATA Tea Gold is not meant for people who like very strong color seekers. Its more workable for people who wants real flavor with natural golden color in the final preparation. Although even a single tea-spoon is enough to prepare a natural golden cup full of real tea.2. One may keep in mind before using that this tea contains real whole dry tea leaves, so it may take more 2 minutes in preparation in comparison with other brands and the reason is, it is without any added artificial colors into it. The whole dried tea leaves takes time to release real flavor of the contents.3. Taste is premium & up to the expectations as always.4. Packaging is good enough. Visual ergonomic principles well taken into consideration designing the same. Its smarter and visually appealing than the previous packs.I’m using this product from more than 2 years. So, its not an random review. In my family we are using this product in making of every single cup day and night 24x7, whenver we feel like to have one.

review: I already tasted this tea from the local store and tastes really good so I bought a large pack from online. The packaging was good and received on time without any damage.

review: The taste is good and one will enjoy. The name GOLD is only superlative. Actual taste is just above average. Tata Tea Gold fails in giving rich brown colour to tea. Hence it does not meet 100% expectation.

review: Amazing flavour... Was searching in all the shops during this covid period but I could not find any one in the market so decided to buy in Amazon and was so happy

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-Leaf-Pouch
review: I've been using Tata Tea Gold since very long time so no doubt about flavour or aroma. But little disappointed with the design of the packet. There is no zip lock like in 1kg pkt. You have to store in air tight container else you will lose the aroma. I bought in lightning deal for Rs. 490.

review: The tea packet was torn . I would like this order replaced

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: I always purchase Tata Agni Leaf tea. Could observe the quality and taste difference a lot this time. Quality not up to the mark. There is much difference between the previous and current tata agni tea purchase. Going forward not going to buy this tea. Waste of money. Not sure if other buyers observed the same.

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Tata Tea Agni is good but the quality of this tea have changed a lot previously there was some leaves but nowadays Tata Tea Agni contains only powder tea or dust tea, it gives good liquor but not so much flavour.If you want good liquor along with flavour then you must go for Tata Gold tea that is a good tea. I bought Tata Tea Agni from Amazon at a very low price compared to the MRP and the packaging of the product was really awesome and it was delivered to my home address Durgapur Rana Pratap Road West Bengal within 5 days of ordering.If you want to buy good quality tea with good flavour then you should buy Tata Gold tea, Taj Mahal tea or Darjeeling tea.

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Simply put, the tea is flavourful & of good quality for a very cheap price compared to others in the market & also I got the 1kg pack for rs.170 which was manufactured recently. I got 3 packs & all 3 was delivered in great condition.

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Good package, it tastes good but  quantity less when compared to red label, but the aroma is nice.... Over all satisfied with the taste....

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Tata Agni Tea is value for money. It's MRP is 220/- . Overall good for buy. I recommend to buy this product. Go for cheaper tea.

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: ₹ 200It's a truly good deal for you !Market price per 100 gram is around ₹ 25-30 , but here's ₹ 20 only.Flavor is extremely good and quite strong.It comes specially for milk-tea.If you ask about the packaging quality, I say Amazon very much disappointed me for the first time, they parceled it via a single poly bag, no cardboard box provided which is not expected from Amazon.Luckily I have received my package 100 % good conditions !

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Expected better quality tea from a brand like Tata tea👎. Very low quality tea. Didn't like it's flavour and taste. Maybe the tea was very old, expired quality. It's disappointing. Tea quality was not upto Tata tea standard.

name: Tata-Agni-Leaf-Tea-1kg
review: Tata Tea Agni is good if you're looking for good less priced option of tea. This tea is not too strong you've to add some large qty to make tea strong. But looking at it's price it's best. The price is 200/kg which is the lowest in the market. I'm using this for last 5 months. Recommended👍👍

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: The product was delivered on time. It's definitely worth the price. Using this for the past 3 months and I have no complaints. Quality of the product is exceptional. It's a bit heavy and no negatives apart from that...

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: I am writing review after 15 days use.Big dial as expected with great quality. Color of dial not too dark specially numbers as shown in photo. Bracelet is also very good. But the packing and container of watch is worst that i have ever seen in online shopping. sometime it stops working when it falls.By pushing the pin it starts working again.overall it is a very good watch. waterproofing  is also working properly.I bought it after 2 month search on amazon and flipkart and it makes worth.

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: Watch seems original but the price paid is equal to showroom price and if u add courier charge is over and above the selling price in showroom. Better buy from showroom rather online since u will get ur product immediately and can able to check the condition there itself. Rest about product is good but the steel quality is Matt finish and not that great to hold. Dial is awesome and lil big in size to give rich look.

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: Excellent quality and looking cool when I wear this, the white dial is awesome and I like it more. Orange needles for time indication gives good look to watch.

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: I received copied watch... I confirm from fasttrack store.. this watch is duplicate and no warranty.. serial no.inside watch dial and stickers are not matching, fasttrack logo not clear on belt, so returning this productBuy from clodtail seller only

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01
review: ❤Ive recived my lovely watch what i like very much ..❤❤✔ITS VERY COMFORT :in some watches we usually get some what little much dipressed bucź hair get stucks in the chain but in this I'm not able to this situation 😍✅but while walking it's hitting the hand which I'm getting some what pain😐😯 ✅I'm very happy to recieve my watch early...

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3121SM01

review: Sexy & smart watch with many new features

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: Small display, gray display, only notification, can't read sms or what app, music controller missing.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: It is perfect. Good condition although the plastic box was cracked. The watch is original, works fine.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: Charging unit is not received to me in the package.?How could I charge the band?

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: The display is very big it was not expected.Also functionality wise we have very few options. Also the display is horizontal and perpendicular to the hand which is difficult to view. By the way a I didn't used it for more time time, I returned it on the same day when I received. So I have no comments on on other portions. But I noticed that the steps tracker updates lately. It is not a step by step update, it is updating in its own time intervals which was not expected in this conventional wristbands of today's market.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: I got a genuine product with a good packaging and safely handled.I have been using this band since 1 month. I didn’t face any issue with it’s battery life and performance. It has functionalities like distance, heart rate, Calorie, steps tracker Which are accurate and in time too. It displays only call And Whatsapp’s texts notifications ( I have connected my band to iphone so I have no idea if it performs differently when connected to Android smartphones). The battery life is almost 5 days if fully charged once! Sensors inside the watch work finely. This band helps to find the phone if lost. It tracks the sleep time as well which will be displayed on a phone. Hope this was helpful For you.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: I'm Using Almost 2 months Nearly its Working Good and Style is Simply Nuce

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP01
review: The product stopped after one day of usage. But since it was a gift and I had bought it early the replacement period ran out. So I am now stuck with a non working smart watch which cannot be fixed anywhere locally. Any insight on what to do now will be really appreciated.

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3120SL01
review: Initially watch was working fine, But then after a month it stopped working, we thought it might have been battery issue, But even after battery replacement, its not working. The internal parts  and wheels are made of plastic. Only the outrside looks sturdy. Waste and cheap product.

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3120SL01
review: It said that it was water resistant (50m) but no it couldn't even resist 3 ft deep water. The polish of the leather straps went off. A little amount of water entered the watch and everyday it becomes vapour and blocks the view now i cannot check the time properly . Fastrack do something

name: Fastrack-Casual-Analog-White-Watch-NK3120SL01

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: 1. sleep mode not operating2. battery life not more than 1 day

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: Good product 👍👍👍👍 as it is my second smart watch this is better than my previous one...

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: I like this band giving almost accurate Heart rate will very Good battery life. Good AMOLED top with decent look ,Broad daylight reading may be improved & if audio can be integrated will give more exciting feel factor

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: Pros -Looks goodIndian brandConsThe software is poor.The band and app get updated everyday for bug fixes, but the update never completes.Sleep tracker doesn't work properly - no auto sensor, it depends on manual time feeding for sleep, plus sleep data changes of band firmware update causes sudden change in connection.Call notification does not work. It worked for a couple of calls, but then stopped on its own.Though the sedentary reminder was switched off, the band keeps vibrating every 15 minutes for reminding, even while walking or doing work. It stops only in night mode or when active workout is on.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: The heart rate monitor shows as OFF on the tracker whereas visible in the phone.The same value should be visible in the tracker as well as shown in the picture

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: I have an order, step tracking was not working and in replacement I received an used watch which was not even packed.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: Ordered 2 of these and Got 2 defective pieces.Frequent impairing from mobile, discrepancy in sleep / movement tracking and horrible interface.Just bought this product for my parents because they wanted a made in India product but guess what, this product is made in China too! Great work Fastrack (Titan)!Would have given it Zero Stars if I possibly could.

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: I had my hopes high but today when I worked out for 45 minutes and the fitband showed that I had lost only 10calories, I decided to return it.... May be this device is only for step counts, and I work out more than walking.... Not good....

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02
review: Product stop working after 15 days no display no charging nothing working very bad experience earlier one I got from Titan shop it last for kore than 2 years pathetic performance for me

name: Reflex-Activity-Tracker-Monitor-SWD90066PP02

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: I have to thank the amazon recommendation engine for suggesting the mysore sandal talc. I never knew mysore sandal brand had a talc! I had purchased mysore sandal soap few weeks back and perhaps due to this purchase amazon would have recommended this as well. Glad I clicked the suggestion and bought one of these! It's good bye to my existing Ponds Sandalwood talc !This review compares Mysore sandal talc vis-a-vis Ponds Sandalwood talcPros-1. The Fragrance is the first thing which hits you as soon as you open the bottle. Its smells pure authentic sandal wood than the perfumed ponds talc powder2. The mysore sandal talc allows you to decide the size of the hole you want to have on the bottle. Ponds one forces you to have 3 holes as soon as you want the top cover. I always hated this with the ponds talc. Ponds really wants you to use more than what you need!3. The fragrance last longer than the ponds sandalwood talc even though out the day! Believe it or not - you have to try one and be the judge!4. Some reviews talk about the powder not been finely powdered. Nothing like that - the powder is as fine as it's with Ponds sandalwood talc. No more no less!5. The bottle is sealed with a hologram sticker - that's assurance of genuine product from mysore sandal!6. Somehow I like the press-fit top of the bottle to keep the fragrance intact in the bottle when not in use! Ponds bottle was a twist to close top which is not really a seal tight way of shutting close the bottle7. Last but not the least- mysore sandal talc is 50% cheaper than Ponds sandalwood - why on earth would I ever buy Ponds again?Cons-None that i spotted yet

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: Mysore Sandal is best talc ever in market.. Long-lasting fragrance increase body charm. And I can its Pure natural sandalwood talc. also its very economic talc but no compromise in quality. Go on.....

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: First time buy, the Talc is okay as its from Mysore Sandal, but still not sure about the scent, longevity and essence of it.Also minimum buy of 2, is not fair & also there wasn't any discount even at the sale time :-( ;-)Well, Amazon, Cloudtail India & Mysore Sandal have done good job, and I believe it will be genuine product!

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: Just amazing fragrance....original product Delicately perfumed with pure natural sandalwood oil....thanks Amazon for giving me natural product ...Mysore sandal talc is the best talc forever..

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: Texture is not good, should be finer. Not so cheap either, you can get Nivea 400 gms at same price.Quality also not good, not soft on my skin. Fragrance also not good, guess not a fan of sandalwood after all.

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: be careful. the image is misleading. it looks like it is offering 3 diff sizes of talcum powder whereas the seller gives only one (large size). if you are expecting to receive all the 3 diff sizes of talcum powder then you are in for a big shock. I think the seller must take note and provide correct product image.

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: I had ordered 2 of these which arrived on Dec 28 2019. However on opening the seals I noticed an unusual detergent like smell and had no smell like sandalwood oil.  It seems either a fraudulent product has been inserted into the container at the source or maybe this was done by some unethical third party. Wanted to return the items, but being a toiletry product, there is no such option. Very unhappy with the purchase

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: It has terrific scent. It's not a pinkish or yellowish colour it's white colour but we can feel it long n last.I think package Design is changed but I'm sure about it, it's genuine product.Highly recommended go with this if ur choice is sandal.Because it's good brand with half of price than other ponds n santoor.

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: Nice product, being a govt made product, the quality and genuineness are there.  No stains left in skin after use, whereas Ponds and some other sandal wood powders leave stucky white stain marks. Fragrance is also long lasting.

name: MYSORE-SANDAL-Mysore-Sandal-Talcum
review: The best product .. So pure.. Must buy

name: Mysore-Whitening-Rejuvenating-Face-Pack
review: I bought this on a lark and it had been sitting on a shelf for a very long time. Till I developed warts on my chin. No amount of pulling and scrubbing helped and I was reluctant to use over-the-counter wart paint because of all the pharma warnings on them.I decided to use this clay on the warts, covering them with a generous coat of the clay twice a day and kept it on day and night for a month. Voila!I had to be patient but a month of application fixed my skin. Whatever this face pack contains, it is extremely effective. I used to a feel a constant sting after application but it can be ignored. The best part is that it didn't affect healthy skin adversely unlike wart paints which require precautions.Caution - These warts weren't because of an STD. I probably picked them up at the gym or some other place with too many people milling around in sweat. Please seek your doctor's advice if you have an STD. This face pack should not be applied on your eyelids or where you have a chance of ingesting it. Read disclaimers on the package.

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: I stay in Bangalore snd used this product on couple of occassion. Its amazing and stands well above any available soap in marketLooking at tje expwrience decided to gift ghe soap to a relative and the product that was delivered was a fake and just a lump of cake with so smell and offcourse no way close to the original soapRelative was shy enough to admit his / her experience late other wise could hav returned the productHppe Amazon takes some action

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: It’s the worst thing you can buy. Do not waste your money. You will land up to a soap which will lead to dry skin after bath and you won’t feel like using it again.  Only using name like millennium soap doesn’t make it a soap of millennium. Buy products like nutregena or forest essential rather then buying this particular soap.

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: Don't think this is original.The golden seal on inside plastic box seems to have been tampered with and resealed with plastic tape.

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: The product is not original.. I just used one I got from store in Bangalore and this is no way close to the original product. The soap is soft and breaks in flakes... the original is not like this .. please don't buy would be my honest opinion.  Rest up to you.

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: i always buy this soap cause it smells like strong sandal wood. when i was first introduced to the soap it was a guy coming out of the shower and i stopped him asking which parfum he uses and he pointed me to the soap. at first i couldnt believe it but now after so many years using it there is no doubt anymore.

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: Something is wrong with this product currently, I've been using it since 3 years nd have loved it but the latest batches delivered to me seem fake. The quality has deteriorated and now the scent goes on decreasing with each time you use the soap. Towards the end it feels/smells like just an ordinary soap. Disappointed.. i miss the pure, older millennium soap

name: Mysore-Sandal-Millennium-Soap-150g
review: Awesome just need to work with the soap dish its a pathetic design water stays in and then the soap gets stuck to itApart of their weirdly pathetic innovation of cheap soap dishThe soap is awesome and amazingClass apart
